I appreciate what happened here: a skeleton Covid staff was not prepared for a full house of evacuees on a Monday night. But aside from a canned apology, nothing was offered.   In the middle of
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear about your experience. As you know, the fire evacuations were unexpected and we did everything we could to accommodate those needing a safe location to stay during their mandatory evacuations. We hope you will consider returning for a visit in the future. If you would like to connect directly, I can be reached at Cindy.Racco@waldorfastoria.com  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: The luxuries premises and the services that we received worth every penny that we spent on it.  We were so pampered since we arrived with cold water, coffee and little chocolate. We did nit need to go anywhere outside the resort because they have shopping stores, small markets, coffee shops, restaurants , bars and the beach club with bars and snacks . Spa with yoga or aerobic classes. My recommendation will be bring some cash for tips . The staff is so nice that deserve it.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you had an awesome experience and that you felt pampered during your trip. Our resort really does have everything you need and we are glad you took advantage of all we have to offer. Thank you for your kind review.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: I loved the luxurious atmosphere. Definitely worth the beach view upgrade. The heated pool and jacuzzi were great! Loves that they had an outdoor gym. Access to the Beach club was amazing. They have fitness classes like yoga, bootcamp, Pilates. Loved it!
Manager Response: We love the heated pool,  infinity edge whirl pools, outdoor gym, and private beach club as well. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Please return for another visit soon. Thank you!   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: I went to the Monarch Beach Resort this last weekend and it was just amazing ! A short weekend break we (myself and my son) will never forget it. It was just amazing and even during Covid-19 we felt super safe and the hotel and it's staff made sure we had a great time ! THANK YOU !
Manager Response: We are so happy you were able to enjoy a weekend away with your son. Please visit again soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here! They started decorating for Christmas and everything looks so lovely. The hotel was not crowded and we were able to safely social distance and enjoy ourselves. Staff is very friendly and helpful and all wear masks. There are sanitizer stations all over as well. We had dinner at the bay club and it’s beautiful!
Manager Response: We pride ourselves in safety and we are so glad you noticed all of our efforts. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and hope you return soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: We love staying at Monarch Beach Resort! This place is the perfect mix of family friendly and luxury! Kori Walker and the MBR staff are amazing! Always going above and beyond! This hotel is a must when visiting Orange County! And the food is beyond! Highly recommend Bourbon Steak for Dinner! There are darling little trolleys that shuttle back and forth to the beach and the on site coffee shop is the best! We love to stay in a fireside room and make s’mores with the kids! All in all we won’t stay anywhere else for our family staycations. This place is so much better then the Ritz in Laguna. Can’t wait for our next stay at the butterfly hotel!
Manager Response: We are pleased that you enjoyed your meal at Bourbon Steak, the trolley rides to the beach, and s'mores with your children. We are flattered that we are your family's favorite resort and can't wait for your next visit. Thank you for taking the time to write such a kind review.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: ***This is for  my March 2020  review at the Monarch Beach Resort  *****                  Due to the Covid 19 ,I have to cancel my return trip to  California in November ,we had very nice stay at the Monarch Beach resort in March for four days for my nieces wedding , Very upscale luxury beautiful resort overlooking the ocean ,location is supper ,half hours drive from John Wayne airport ,only 15 mins walk to the beach ,front staff very professional ,have the Can Do Attuite all the time , we booked  a lovely room on upper flour , with balcony ,lovely ocean views  , rooms very huge and clean , ,I think typical hotel room is  300 to 350sq feet , beds very comfortable ,bathroom very cool and well stock towels ,resort have every things you need ! pets are well come too ! I am looking
Manager Response: We are glad we were able to serve as your retreat from the hustle and bustle. Please return for a visit soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: This is resort is incredible in every way.  Beautiful, clean, friendly staff
Summary: This resort is really great.  Very beautiful, well maintained property with great staff.  Food was great as well.  First time at the property and will come back again soon.  The beach club on the sand was nice and the shuttles were super easy.
Manager Response: We are happy you thoroughly enjoyed your first trip to our resort. Please come back soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: Stayed here with my wife for her 60th birthday. From the moment we arrived with out bicycles, golf clubs, and various amounts of luggage for our two night visit we were greeted and treated like royalty. All staff were kind and helpful, giving us tips on how to get around (there's a House Car, a Cadillac Escalade, with a driver to take you to Dana Point for restaurants, etc.). Covid-19 protocols in place (masks in public areas, outdoor gym, blah, blah, blah). There is a great golf course onsite, but it's pretty expensive. Only two of the holes actually play near the water, but the overall experience is good with very nice course conditions (at least at this time). You can see my review of the course on Greenskeeper.org. Bell hops, valet, shuttles, house car, maid service all get
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort for your wife's birthday celebration. Please return again soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: This place is beautiful with an amazing golf course. With that said I'd like to say that I don't mind spending money but I don't like wasting it or being deceived out of it. My $321 room that I found online became a $530 room when I called to inquire about a "stay & play" package which would have been fine but golf was still an additional  $205 per person on top of the $530 room rate. On top of this there is still a $60 per day parking fee and a $55 per day resort fee. WOW! After taxes this brought my $530 room to over $700 per night. As I said before, this place is beautiful and If I had been told up front that I was paying $700 per night I probably would have been ok but the additional fees they don't relay to you kind of irritated me. Also, they advertise a promotion that if
Manager Response: Good afternoon Leonard,   We are sorry you experienced this. I would like the opportunity to connect with you directly at Cindy.Racco@waldorfastoria.com so we can learn more about your stay.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: A truly exceptional stay! We had never been there before and found it an amazing, beautiful and relaxing getaway. Room service breakfast, service at the pool with John- wonderful at every turn. We can’t wait to return. #bravoMonarchBeach Resort.
Manager Response: We are glad you experienced a truly exceptional stay! Thank you for your kind review.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: 10/10 Stay!!!! At first, we were bummed since the weather did not turn out as we had hoped, however, we were still able to have an amazing time during our 4 night stay. Our experience from beginning to end was so unbelievable. Everyone was so friendly and accommodating, from the front desk, concierge, in room dining, spa, hostesses, servers, valet, bellmen, resort services, tram driver... etc! All of our meals were SO GOOD. The fitness classes were wonderful and challenging. I do not have a single negative comment to leave...We cannot wait to come back!!! <3 <3 <3 <3
Manager Response: We are so happy you had an absolutely incredible experience. Hopefully next time you visit the weather will deliver as well.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: We loved our stay here. Everyone is always willing to help and they make sure we enjoy our stay there. We want to thank Naty, Room service, Jonathan front desk for all your help! Valet parking staff! Great job!!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review and are so happy you loved your getaway. Please plan your next trip soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: Always a pleasure to be at this resort. Excellent service from the beginning to end. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The staff was always friendly and greeted us wherever we were. We will most definitely return.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had such an excellent experience. We look forward to your next stay.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: My friend and I checked in to the Monarch for a quick getaway and had the most amazing time.  We literally are already talking about our return trip.  The staff was attentive, and we had great conversations with everyone we came across. Our room was very clean and beautiful, we had absolutely no issues with anything whatsoever.  We loved sitting on our balcony looking at the ocean and having great conversations.  I will be returning as soon as possible and telling all my friends that this is a must do!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are thrilled you had a wonderful quick getaway and we look forward to your next vacation with us.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This hotel exceeded all our expectations. My only regret is not visiting it sooner. The views are magnificent and the property is well kept. Service was top notch and the food was great. We are actually local (live only 20 minutes away). We thought it would be a good idea to test traveling with children during the pandemic by staying close. The hotel adapted very well. They even relocated the gym to an outdoor venue. We’ve had the privilege to visit many great hotels worldwide and I can say with confidence this is among the most pleasant and memorable ones.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your very kind review. Please visit for your next staycation soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This place is absolutely wonderful. If you are looking for a family friendly resort which has truly taken COVID precautions seriously, this is your place! I am a physician and have experienced other hotels/resorts after the pandemic which have not made the necessary adjustments to keep families safe. Monarch beach resort has gone above and beyond to keep all guests safe and keep all amenities they can available to guests per state guidelines. They have moved their entire gym outdoors, grounds are spacious and easy to social distance. They are serious about cleaning and sanitizing and I never felt unsafe. Our kids, age 5, 5, and 1, enjoyed the pool, splash pad, beach and riding bikes. My wife and I enjoyed the amazing suite, gym classes, peloton bikes, and great food at the
Manager Response: We are glad you had the best family vacation and we appreciate you noticing all the effort we put in to making our guests feel safe during this time.   We hope you return soon for your next vacation.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Only sad to say my special made to order birthday cake (leftover) wasn't able to recover after room being check out.  It's a great resort to do any events. The sunset is so pretty that a picture must have.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday! Thank you for celebrating with us. We hope you return soon for your next vacation.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: My family was evacuated from the Silverado Fire and we have been to the Monarch Beach Resort before. We immediately thought to stay there since they accept dogs, it’s a 5 star resort and we were hoping the air quality would be better over there. If we had to be evacuated anywhere during a pandemic we definitely picked the right place. Everything is beautiful from the rooms to the views. The customer service is top notch and their food is very tasty too. We can’t wait to come back just for a getaway.
Manager Response: We are glad we were able to help you and your family during your evacuation. We are sure that this time was stressful for you, but glad you are all safe. We hope you can return for a proper vacation soon. Thank you!   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We’ve started traveling again and decided to do a little local vacation in Dana Point. We have heard great things about Monarch Bay so we’re excited for a nice weekend. First the good. Staff there is very helpful and attentive, some even to the point of being over accommodating. However they are stuck in a failed system. From the checkin to the facilities this place is run more like a low end family vacation resort than a five star establishment. Along with this, the COVID precautions left lots to be desired. I have to admit we stayed at another five star resort the weekend before (also kid friendly) so I’m using them for comparison. Our checkin was a disaster with a long line right in the middle of the lobby with lots of people walking back and forth (about half masked). Our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this detailed review. We are glad that your experience with our beach house hospitality was positive. We do have many protocols and procedures in place to ensure the safety of our guests, employees, and members are top priority. We appreciate you sharing your feedback and observations with us. We hope you return for another visit soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: It was great being able to stay at the monarch to celebrate a haloween theme sleepover for my daughter and nephews. Living near the area and getting to spend some time with family was mich needed. Since Halloween is canceled we thought this sleepover would be the perfect alternative. We stayed in double bed room and the beds were amazing. The shower was excellent and the biew magnificent. You do feel like you’re not in dana point. Special shoutouts to everyone the helped us during our stay Frontdesk to the amazing Nicole and friendly Victoria, super kind housekeeper Marybeth and super helful bellman christopher. This was seriously one of the vacations for the books
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such a kind review. We are glad your daughter enjoyed her halloween themed sleepover and that you enjoyed spending time with family. We hope you return again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Overpriced —-Not luxurious like the StRegis was - how does Monarch get a 5 star rating
Summary: We didn’t go to the Ritz Carlton because some say the Ritz lost its luster when it became a Marriott. It probably has.  Well the same can be said for the Monarch.The Monarch has lost the St Regis flair. Where are the luxurious hotels of past years? The staff was very helpful. Most staff implemented the COVID rules even though the Bourbon and Aveo Resto were crowded and the tables closer than 6 feet. Very stressed about that. The food was very good but we spent over $1000 for dinner. And expected to be served This great dinner on more than an ugly outside patio table. How much would it have cost to add style to a patio table for such an expensive dinner? A simple white tablecloth and nice chairs would have made the dinner experience magical. I give an F to whomever is in charge
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. We appreciate your review and will share this information with the management team.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: My wife and I had an amazing stay with our friends at Monarch Bay Resort this last weekend.  The highlight of their exceptional customer service was delivered from Shane our valet. Upon arriving at the hotel he saw we had brought our mountain bikes with us and asked where we were going to ride. Not only did he tell us where to ride locally, he met up with us the next morning (during his free time) to take us out on the local trails in San Clemente. Amazing time. Amazing service. Thank you Shane and everyone else at Monarch Beach Resort.
Manager Response: We are so glad you were able to experience our beach house hospitality and that you enjoyed your stay with your friends. Please return again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Gorgeous hotel. Was there in early October. They take great care about cleanliness during the pandemic. Not sure how it is when it’s fully functioning-but spent most of the days by the pool. Kinda wished they had an adults only pool. Signs for the spa needed to show compliance with social distancing. Still showed max 18 in the spa/hot tub and at one point it almost got there. Didn’t look like lounge chairs were removed to allow distancing-pool attendants seem to steer people in the direction to allow for it. Rooms were gorgeous. Got a room with a view out to the golf course into the Pacific Ocean. Resort fee doesn’t include parking/valet btw-thought it did so it was a surprise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do follow all safety protocols and regulation and ensure that all team members go through an extensive certification process. We do appreciate your feedback and will look into the comments you provided. We hope you return for another stay soon.   Markus Krebs  General Manager

Summary: From driving in, checking in and walking in our room the resort staff was super helpful and friendly. Everyone was wearing a mask and cleanliness was key everywhere. I definitely felt and saw how much time and effort they put into making everything clean and COVID free. You must take the tram down to the bay club and have a sunset dinner. The local catch with dill sauce was amazing. The whipped mashed potatoes were to die for and the pina coladas were not too sweet and actually really refreshing! Breakfast at Aveo was really good too. We’re definitely going back soon for another staycation
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and we are so happy you enjoyed our beach house hospitality.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Had a wonderful 4 night stay.  Staff was attentive and very helpful.  Location is ideal.  My only complaint is that was the pool area was not cleaned as cigarettes and wrappers were floating in and around the hot tub area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and will look into your feedback right away.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: MB Resort will not disappoint. It is well worth the expense and every single member of the staff is lovely!  I had planned a sisters trip, but ended up solo and was very comfortable. The private beach was gorgeous and the resort is thoughtfully accommodating and health safety conscious during this COVID crisis. I will definitely return!
Manager Response: We are so glad that you had a heavenly experience! Please return soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This was a gorgeous property with great service that was both flexible and accommodating!  Even during Covid I felt safe and almost like we could escape the pandemic and assume a great reality within the walls. Spacious and luxurious but not overwhelming in size and quite intimate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so glad you enjoyed your escape. Please return soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel and surrounding with access to beach.
Summary: I am a repeat customer at the Monarch due to its beautiful and spacious rooms and facilities and amazing grounds and location.  A free tram takes you down to the beach and the beach restaurant.  I am not a fan of the Steak and Bourbon restaurant but the more casual Aveo is always good as is the pool side and beach food offerings.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. Please return again soon. Thank you for your review.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Beautiful, lush resort with great food,service,beach, & golf. Tremendous views of golf course & pacific ocean. Beach Club access, just a short trolly ride away, sets this resort apart from most golf resorts with beautiful restaurant and beach chair set ups right on the private Pacific Ocean beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review. We are so glad you were able to experience our beach house hospitality.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This resort is by far the most beautiful Resort we have stayed in. Over the last few years my daughters and I have stayed in various resort all along the California Coastline. We really enjoyed this resort. From the very beginning when the valet greets you, to the front desk attendees, cleaning crew, waiters, and pool side servers they all had a smile and incredible customer service. The resort is amazing! The property grounds were super clean! 🌺 We stayed in a one bedroom suite with an ocean view. It was a spectacular view. We can’t wait to stay here again. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Manager Response: We are so glad that you had an amazing experience. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Safe place for a pandemic getaway
Summary: My husband and I have not been out for 8 months and we decided to have a change of scenery for my birthday. We have been to Monarch Beach when it was St. Regis so we were familiar with the property. We stayed Sunday to Wednesday which was perfect because there weren't very many people.  I am glad to see that all guests followed the mask policy everywhere we went. Every corner there were automated hand sanitizing machines. People were respectful of personal space and social distance.  We booked a one bedroom suite with 2 bathrooms and 2 balconies which was perfect for a 3-night stay. Even if we were facing the pool the glass doors were sound proof so we couldn't hear the noise from outside. Our room was cleaned every day and we received bottled water during turndown. I wish they
Manager Response: We are happy you celebrated your birthday with us! It sounds like you had an excellent stay and we hope you return for your next visit soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: Gorgeous property with an incredible beach. The rooms are nice, and very clean with a great team service to the beach and golf course. Unfortunately service on the property was average from valet to Bourbon. Average wait time of 15 mins for every drink, or food order. We do understand with Covid, staff was likely limited. Beach staff was very attentive setting up umbrellas and chairs but the service disconnect would happen as soon as one leaves the beach for the restaurant. The worst service was at Bourbon where we felt invisible during our meal service. Busboys and host were very good, waitstaff was non existent so we left prior to ordering dessert since it was taking too long to flag her down.  We would love to return because of the amenities and hope next time staff is more
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed the private beach club. We appreciate hearing your perspective and experience at Bourbon Steak OC. We will take your feedback to the team.   We hope you return for another vacation soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing get away. We felt like we were on a tropical island
Summary: Friendly staff, very clean. Housekeeping tended to our rooms 2x per day left our room cozy and clean everytime we drifted away. We escaped to the beach on a shuttle that was clean in between every ride. The hotel is immaculate with so much to do in a world that has become limited they took every measure possible to make our experience memorable and safe. We can’t wait to come back.
Manager Response: We are so glad you had an amazing getaway. Thank you for your kind review. Please return for another vacation soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We had such a wonderful time at the Monarch Beach Resort. The food was delicious and everyone was so kind. We hope to go back soon when Covid-19 is more contained so we can use the pool and more of the amenities.
Manager Response: We are thrilled you had a wonderful time at Monarch Beach Resort. Thank you for your nice review. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: a second visit to the Monarch Beach Resort
Summary: after staying here last year and having a rather underwhelming time  (hence my rather underwhelming review last year), I decided to give this resort another chance. I have to say, I'm so glad I did! After reaching out to the new manager (a delightful Mr. Krebs who just so happens to be German...like myself...) my family and I booked 2 rooms for a 4 night getaway. From check in to check out this experience was nothing like last time. First, we were upgraded to 2 beautiful Junior Suites  ( I unfortunately have some issues with heat and found my room a bit hot although very spacious and pretty) so we moved to a cooler and more private one. Our son enjoyed a gorgeous room with partial ocean view. every single interaction with hotel staff couldn't have gone better...chocolate covered
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Monarch Beach Resort for your getaway. We are thrilled you enjoyed our beach house hospitality. We look forward to your next visit.    Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Wonderful resort in a beautiful location.  Close to Laguna Beach with cliff walk, shops, restaurants. Best part is easy access to private beach, where they will set up chairs and umbrellas, beach club with restaurant and clean bathrooms. Staff are friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed our beach house hospitality. Please return for another vacation soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: The property is gorgeous and service amazing. However there is no self parking and valet lost my car keys and I was very stressed.They ended up taking me to work but I was late. They found the keys later and brought my car to my work.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and voicing your concerns. We apologize for the valet issue and sorry you were late to work. We are glad that overall you enjoyed your stay and we hope you return soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We took advantage of a Travelzoo certificate to snag a first floor firepit room at greatly reduced rates for a short staycation. It was a great experience. In recognition of the continuing pandemic, the hotel took extra precautions to maintain safety. Mask-wearing was routine among both the staff and guests.   The room was a good size but not massive. The best feature was the patio that provided access to the room using a room key card from the landscaped courtyard area as well as the regular hallway. We used the roaring firepit both nights we stayed--although we had to phone or text the front desk for help getting the thing lit despite following the multi-part instructions that were less than clear.  We used the open air shuttle to and from the nearby beach; there were plastic
Manager Response: We are so happy you had a top notch experience. Thank you for your kind review. We hope you return soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This hotel was so beautiful, service was Amazing. The employees were super helpful, and went above and beyond to make us feel so seen and cared for. The Food & parking were wayyyy to Expensive. Overall this hotel was great just wish the parking and food didn't cost so much.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed our beach house hospitality. Thank you for your review and also sharing your concerns. We hope you return again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Have stayed at this property many times and as always excellent overall.  One recommendation is to fix the pool gate as it is extremely loud when guests come in and out.  Other than that perfect stay.  Staff extremely friendly.  The outdoor gym is phenomenal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that your stay was excellent overall and appreciate your suggestion as well. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent property but beware of reservations and your bill
Summary: The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  The rooms are well appointed with great views of the golf course and ocean.  There is a .lot of activities to do here and three restaurants on the property.  There is even a tram that takes you to different parts of the resort.    My only complaint is when I made my reservation I never got a confirmation so I called to get a copy.  They said they would send it but still never received it.  I then saw $1600 charge to my credit card and called to find out why the charge.  It turns out that had me arriving one month before we were to arrive and counting us as a no show.  I got this taken care of and told they would transfer the charge to my stay.  But when I got my bill it was not there.  There was also a dinner charge for $310 that was
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay, but we do apologize for your billing issue. I am available to connect directly if you would prefer Cindy.Racco@waldorfastoria.com  Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: had a great time traveling to Monarch Beach Resort in August with our family, and a family friend.  The kids enjoyed the pool, and the beach, and the restaurants.  Special thanks to Ariel for upgrading our room to a ground level room with a fire pit so the kids could enjoy running on the grass, while the adults sat by the cozy fire.  This is one of our favorite hotels in CA!
Manager Response: We are so glad that we're one of your favorite resorts in California. Thank you for the kind review.  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This was our second time there since July and we would definitely go back. The valet staff, the front desk staff, the bellman, the beach staff, the trolley driver,  housekeeping.. everything was top notch. Everyone is always very helpful and polite.  We travel all around the world and this hotel is definitely in our top 5. We will absolutely go back over and over again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled you had a fabulous stay. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Monarch Beach Resort is still quite a beauty despite Covid restrictions.  The golf course looked pristine, and the beach club has become a destination on its own.  The hotel is beginning to show its age, though.  There are limited USB outlets, and the restaurants have very limited menus.  All the food is great, but there could be a little more variety.  We did not eat at Bourbon, but it looked fabulous.  My ONLY complaint is that our terrific suite was at the very end of a very long hallway.  I got my workout in every day just getting to the elevator.  The place is so big and grand it is easy to get lost.  You cannot go wrong with this resort.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments, I will share them with the resort team. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We wanted a short getaway to celebrate my daughter's new job and the Monarch Beach Resort was better than we could have imagined, especially in a pandemic.  In comparing resorts, the Monarch was far and away more open than the others in the area.  We felt "normal" for the two days we were there (despite wearing masks in the common areas.)  It was clean with every Covid precaution in place including sanitizing stations galore.  It was also fully operational from restaurants to trams to pool attendants.  Every staff person we encountered was absolutely lovely.  Rooms were well appointed and the pillows and beds oh so comfortable. We got a wonderful deal because we stayed on a Monday.  I cannot wait to return.
Manager Response: We are glad you had a nice celebration. Please return soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: I live locally, and enjoy the Resort daily for exercise classes, golf and a range of dining options. As a treat (and a bit of mental R&R) I stay overnight once a week. I always feel like a valued guest; actually like a valued part of the Resort community. Covid as been rough on everyone, but MBR is a wonderful bit of calm and peace these days.
Manager Response: Thank you for being such a loyal guest and for the kind review. We look forward to your next stay.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Another great stay at the Monarch Beach Resort. This location is amazing with magnificent views of the resort and of the Pacific Ocean. The room was very comfortable with a private balcony, soaking tub bathrobes and slippers. Exercise classes and tram rides to the private beach are lovely bonuses. This stay gets a 10!
Manager Response: Kristy H.,   Thank you for your kind review. We are glad you had a magnificent stay. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: 5 star service and amenities but avoid garden view rooms
Summary: I met one of my dear friends at MBR for a long weekend.  She had a pool view king room on the 5th floor which had a lovely view.  Every team member we had contact with were incredibly friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and a decent size, but nothing spectacular.  The view and service is where the resort really shines.  They have Covid-19 measures in place and felt like they did a great job trying to keep their employees and guests safe.  Disposable masks available, hand sanitizing stations located throughout the resort, etc.  We ate at Bourbon twice and it was outstanding.  We also really enjoyed the beach club restaurant.   On the last day my friend decided to extend her stay and I was more than willing to extend mine as well.  Unfortunately the room we were in was
Manager Response: We are glad you had an outstanding stay. Thank you for your kind review and also for providing your feedback and preference regarding the garden rooms. We hope you return for another stay soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: I decided to treat myself to stay at this resort for my birthday since we are all quarantine and only had my mom and daughter come along and absolutely loved it and the place was very clean and felt safe. When I arrived I made sure to let them know it was my birthday and I received a complimentary gift from them and also had perks for working as a health care professional during my stay will definitely come back and for many more birthdays to come.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your birthday celebration! Please return again for another stay soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We just arrived here at the Monarch Beach Resort for a baby moon and my husband's birthday. We booked the Resort View King and super excited as we have not left the bay area due to covid concerns specially we are pregnant.  The lady that assisted us was warm and friendly. I advised we prefer a quieter room and she acknowledged. When we arrived to the room (417) we realized she placed us in a room facing the back of the resort and a parking lot and what would be considered as a Garden View, a downgrade from what we paid. My concern is she didnt really explained or described the room to us but bec she was nice we just trusted her.  Almost 6hrs of driving and 7 months in house containment, we expect a little bit more for this much awaited trip. I called the receptionist but they
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I would like the opportunity to connect with you directly if you would like to share any further details around your stay. I can be reached at Cindy.Racco@waldorfastoria.com  Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a close to home 'Get-A-Way'
Summary: We really enjoyed our overnight stay at this resort. All of the staff wore masks and there are sanitizer stations throughout the resort. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was clean. The dinner at Aveo was fantastic and socially distanced during a beautiful sunset. We did not use the pool or go down to the beach due to time constraints, but will when we return.
Manager Response: We are glad you had a nice getaway and enjoyed your staycation. We hope on your next visit you will have time to relax at the pool and experience the private beach club as well. We look forward to your next stay.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: The service, accommodations, foos and overall property is a five star experience. Worth every penny. I highly recommend the property for a personal stay and a business event. The outdoor space is plentiful.
Manager Response: We are glad you had a five star experience! Thank you for the recommendation and lovely review. Please return for a trip soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful, Beautiful and relaxing staycation during COVID times
Summary: We stayed one night on a Tuesday when my son had the following day off of school. Check in was easy, our room was beautiful and we enjoyed the pool, the jacuzzi and the beach. We ate at the Monarch Beach Club and the food out really tasty. Pricey a bit high but expected considering that it's the resort. The grounds are beautiful. The man who drove us to the private beach in the tram was very kind. Valet was fast and everyone that worked at the hotel was truly wonderful. We did not have anything negative to say. We loved it so much we almost stayed another day but didn't have our computers with us so we will just have to come back to enjoy another staycation. This was our first trip post March COVID lockdown. We were a bit nervous but there were hand sanitizers everywhere on the
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review. We are glad you had such a wonderful staycation and were able to enjoy the pool, whirl pools, beach, and private beach club. Please return soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: I stayed here recently and was amazed by this resort. The rooms are great, service is exceptional and overall experience was spot on. I have no complaints and everyone in my family was truly happy with this trip. It is pricey but worth every penny. I am totally happy and will definitely come back. I chose monarch over the ritz and am happy I made the right decision. There precautions regarding covid are spot on and at no point did I feel unsafe. Will defenitley recommend to friends and family. Thank you Monarch Beach Resort for an excellent weekend!
Manager Response: We are glad you were amazed with your stay and so happy that you had exceptional service and enjoyed your room. We are looking forward to your next trip.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: My husband and I had a lovely get-a-way at Monarch Beach Resort.  Our favorite thing was the beach club and service on the beach. The food was excellent and we enjoyed the gorgeous, private beach.  The tram ride made accessing the beach really easy.
Manager Response: We are happy you had such a lovely getaway. The beach club is also one of our favorite locations. It really is a special place. Please return for your next stay soon.   Cindy Racco Hotel Manager

Summary: Beautiful place. Great location! Service was not great. With kids you need a little more help which they are not willing to give. Waited for Valet 15 minutes every time. The private beach was the highlight - service on the way down and at the beach was great. But the front desk and Valet were not helpful.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed the private beach club. I would like the opportunity to connect with you directly regarding your concerns. Please contact me at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Thank you!   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We had a great time at the resort and loved spending the weekend there - the resort is beautiful. However, there were a few things that left us a little disappointed. First, there was a large birthday party at the pool that took the attention of most of the pool staff, so we were waiting for very long periods of time to order anything, even just to get some water. Second, we specifically selected and paid for a “resort view” room hoping to have a view of the main part of the resort compared to a “garden view” room. However, we ended up facing out to the side of the hotel at the golf course parking lot and were told “resort view” rooms included any room with a view of the property. These were small things and overall had a great weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad you had a great weekend. Please return again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: No better place to relax and enjoy the pool and beach than the Monarch Beach Resort!  First class in every way!  The beach club is a 10+!  We feel like we just spent a week in Hawaii but it’s only been 2 nights!  Love this place!  Nichole at check in was awesome and made our start to a great weekend perfect!  She’s a keeper!
Manager Response: We are glad you are having a first class experience and that you feel like you are in Hawaii! Thank you for writing such a kind review. Please return soon for your next staycation.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: A great resort made better by superlative service. Wonderful grounds with all the amenities you should expect in a 5 star resort.  Easy check in.  Friendly staff.  Something  for everyone, and for us the key is relaxing.
Manager Response: We are glad you had a relaxing stay and that you enjoyed our beach house hospitality. Please return for another stay soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We stumbled onto the Monarch Beach Resort because our "usual" SoCal hotel wasn't available, and we're so glad we've discovered MBR. What a beautiful resort - the rooms are lovely, the staff is terrific, the pool is beautiful, the beach is delightful, and the golf course is spectacular. As a runner, it was also great to explore running in the area and the hotel's use of RunGo, which I hadn't used before but was great. We'd highly recommend MBR!
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay and the RunGo app. The trails down to the beach are great for running. Please return soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This is our third time back and it is truly an exceptional experience every time. The place is gorgeous and grand, but the staff all the way from the valet to bell to Maitre D are top notch and truly seem to enjoy being hospitable to others. We have created many wonderful family memories here where we can disconnect from our busy lives and we will continue to return.
Manager Response: We are thrilled you enjoyed our beach house hospitality. We appreciate your review.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Eileen Hanly from Monarch was such a pleasure to work with. After changing venues several times due to Covid, she was more than willing to assist me. I’m glad I got married at Monarch. My husband and I loved the customer service from hotel staff too.
Manager Response: Congratulations and we are so thrilled that we were a part of your special day.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: What a perfect spot for a midweek get away from Los Angeles. Especially in this Covid era, it was nice to go to a place that was not jampacked, socially distanced, and conscious of cleaning protocols. A great facility and location. We hope to go back soon
Manager Response: We are glad you were able to enjoy your getaway. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: 3 and a half star at best. If you are into a resort with a TON of kids and below average customer service, this is your spot. Try and get a discounted room on another site though. No sense paying $600 a night for the room, $55 a night for resort fee, $55 a night to park and $70 a night for tax if u are getting less than 4 star service. nothing bad happened and i'm not a hater. Just been to dozens of 5 star resorts around the world in my 30's and 40's and this just is not one of them. Positives: nice views, nice property, Burbon Steak restaurant... But tough to justify $28 hamburgers, etc with a massive amount of little kids screaming wherever you went. Not just the pool, but the restaurants, lobby, private beach..i mean everywhere..9 out of 10 parties had little kids.
Manager Response: We apologize and what you describe does not meet our standards. I would appreciate the opportunity to connect with you directly to further discuss at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com.  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: As someone who, in a former career, has reviewed hotels in a professional capacity, I am undoubtedly nit-picky. There were some nice things about this hotel- the restaurant waiters and servers at the pool are friendly, the view is beautiful and the updated public areas feel luxurious (though the rest of the hotel is dated). But the devil is In the details- our sink was clogged, the fire pit in our “fire-side terrace room” didn’t work, maid service never came and there was litter all over the property that nobody seemed to notice. The thing that really stood out to me though was, for a high price point hotel, the service from the mid and senior level staff is nonexistent. When we checked in, I mentioned we were celebrating my daughter’s sixth birthday and asked where I could get
Manager Response: Lissy Carbone,   We apologize and what you describe does not meet our standards. I would appreciate the opportunity to connect with you directly to further discuss at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Fantastic three night stay in a fireside room. Superior service and most beautiful views. Worth the stay just to attend the private beach and delicious beach club shrimp tacos. Wonderful staff in all areas .
Manager Response: I am glad you enjoyed your stay at Monarch Beach Resort. Thank you for your kind review.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: I don't generally leave reviews, but I would be remiss if I didn't express our gratitude for a wonderful family vacation during these stressful and uncertain times. Everything about our stay was first class, and the staff at this resort are truly a reflection of the General Manager's leadership. You can tell they love their job, and that reflects in the customer service and detail.   We were VERY nervous to travel anywhere during the pandemic, but while looking at possibilities of a vacation, we found the Monarch Beach Resort. We have a little one with some medical needs, and a grandpa with some medical concerns, and this resort went WAY beyond in accommodating our family. Not only were we able to travel here safely, but the staff was so kind in reassuring this nervous grandma.
Manager Response: We are so glad that we are your "go-to" vacation destination and that you had a first class stay. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We go to Mexico 2 times a year and this time around we couldn't go because of covid 19, so we decided to stay local. So we pick Monarch beach resort. Overall the trip was terrible everything was overrated! On top of it we were over charge on the room, which they don't tell you about the $250 instenial fee on the room per night not just altogether. My friend payed with his debt and the resort over drawn his account.  The food was ok but the prices were outrageous . My friends and I will never come back here again and I will spread the word.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you had a negative experience. I would like the opportunity to further discuss this with you directly. Please contact me at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com.  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We love MBR. The staff is warm, welcoming and attentive. The rooms are spacious, clean, and inviting. The shopping in Laguna is fabulous and there are several restaurant choices. An added bonus for anyone who likes to surf, the resort is near San Clemente surf shops and San Onofre surf spot.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your family time at Monarch Beach Resort. Thank you for your kind review.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: I just got home from a wonderful stay at MBR and felt the need to give it the 5 star review it deserves. I had to go down from LA for a little bit of work/ family vacation. We were had the best time from start to finish.   The resort is beautifully appointed, our room was comfortable, and the food is fantastic at the pool, breakfast place (Aveo) but dinner at Bourbon Steak was unbelievable. We travel a lot and live in LA and it was hands down one of the best meals we had. Ever.   The outdoor gym is great, the trolley ride to the beach and the beach set up is a nice departure compared to other 5 star resorts we have stayed at in OC. We got a cabana by the pool one day and it was worth every penny however the service was no different then the day before when we didn't have one.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a truly wonderful trip and we are glad you had an amazing experience at Bourbon Steak, the beach trolly, outdoor athletic club, and cabana at the pool. Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: From the moment we checked in the service was impeccable! The front desk/concierge staff, pool/beach  service and everyone we encountered went above and beyond to ensure all our needs were met. We usually travel abroad during the summer but so glad we found this stunning,  well kept resort, right in our backyard. My husband loved the golf course and we already booked three more stays this year! Thanks Monarch!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we are so pleased you booked three more stays! We can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Obviously the property is stunning, but I have to really compliment the valet and bell hops. They worked their butts off and were always pleasant, friendly and oh so helpful. Bell hop, Marcel, really stood out to me. We were leaving when my 3 year old daughter realized she had left her blanky in the room. I'm sure most people understand the importance of a little one's blanky!  We had already been out of the room for hours and Marcel personally walked us to the room to look for it. Thankfully they hadn't cleaned the room yet and it was rolled up in the blankets!  He was a life saver for that!
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed our Beach House Hospitality. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Horrible service and staff! Beach is very far from the hotel is not walking distance you will have to take a golf cart and wait for 45 minutes for one. Cleanliness is horrible there was vomit on the bedskirt and not COVID friendly at all. .way over capacity!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. The scenic woody tram ride to the private Monarch Bay Beach Club is typically a popular attraction and we apologize that the experience wasn’t to your liking.  We value your point of view and appreciate that you’ve taken the time to share it here.

Summary: Can't say enough about our experience at MBR! We knew a vacation during a pandemic would be different because of the extra precautions, but my stress levels were immediately reduced upon arrival. Every single detail made this stay exactly what we needed during these crazy times.  We felt safe at all times, and there was extra special attention to social distancing, sanitizing, traffice flow, and staff-to-guests interactions.  Some amenities were closed for obvious reasons, but the pool, outdoor fitness classes, and beach activities still offered enough options for our whole family! We would definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: In this place it's a paradise, we forgot we were only 2 hour drive from home. This one of a kind only a Socal experience.  Be ready to pay handsomely for all the service that this 5 star resort offers.
Manager Response: We are glad your experience felt like paradise. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Not the 5 Diamond Service we expected
Summary: We ended up booking this hotel after we were evacuated from a dude ranch in Northern Ca due to the fires.  Drove 10 hours with three kids and we were excited to stay here for the first time.  We typically stay at the Ritz but had family staying here and we decided to join them.  It was clear from the start that the hotel was short staffed.  We pulled up and no one approached the car, my husband unpacked the car himself, (which he is fine with however we expected a 5 diamond experience) the front desk experience when we checked in and got our room/moved rooms was horrible. There were multiple things that happened over our three day stay.  No one answered the phones, the concierges at the front treated us like we were a total inconvenience, both sinks in the room were broken, big
Manager Response: I am sorry you did not have the experience you were hoping for. I would like to have the opportunity to connect with you directly around your concerns at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This was probably out 6th stay at MBR.  We actually stayed at the Ritz-Carlton up the street for the first two nights, then the next 4 at MBR.  Service and friendliness of staff, the cleanliness and style of decor, the fact that it wasn’t a mad house with long lines with poor service, and the attention to virus protocols and enforcement of masks we FAR superior to the Ritz.  In fact I’d go so far as to say we didn’t enjoy anything (besides being on the beach) at the Ritz and that we loved everything about Monarch Beach Resort.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed our beach house hospitality. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Family trip. Tram to beach impressed us with cleanliness protocol. Super fun to have beach chairs and umbrellas set up for us and had lunch on the beach!  Waves were great for body surfing. Dog friendly. Nice paved walking trails around resort and surrounding neighborhood.
Manager Response: We are pleased you had such a fun time with your family. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We we’re super excited for this getaway. It’s nice that we were able to only drive 20 minutes and feel like we were hours from home. There were a few hiccups… But I’d say the worst part was our second night there. I had just turned off all the lights off around 9 and the kids were asleep, when about 20 minutes later some teenagers decided to pound on our door as if they were going to break it down. I compared it to ding-dong- ditching when I reported it to security. Unfortunately, it startled my children so I had several of them crying and it took quite some time for that to end. My bed became one big slumber party and a couple of them woke up throughout the night worried it was going to happen again. It’s a shame that after paying that much money a good nights rest can’t be
Manager Response: Good afternoon Snoangi,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are sorry that you felt like your expectations were not completely met during your stay. We pride ourselves in our StaySafe Program to ensure we are providing a high standard in cleanliness, sanitation, and distancing protocols for all guests.  I would like the opportunity to connect with you further about your concerns if you would allow. Please contact me at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect spot for a relaxing stay.
Summary: The cabin was very clean and cozy. If you're looking for a relaxing spot to unwind, this is it.  Our host Cynthia was super sweet and attentive.  I spent the majority of my time on the back porch swing enjoying the view which was spectacular.
Manager Response: We are glad you had a relaxing stay. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Monarch Beach Resort is the very definition of Southern California fun, in the sun, on the beach, in the pool, and with some Awesome people.  The MBR is pet friendly and it’s so nice as we were checking in to see the various friendly animals. We checked in quickly and efficiently. The help with the luggage was very good but he was a source of information of everything that is available. A lot is available, pool, beach, golf exercise classes, and food, restaurants.  Just walking the grounds is beautiful. Walking down to the beach is fun.  We did a sunrise walk to the beach, rode the little trolly back from the beach.  They have such lovely terraces, the Breakfest place has us sitting in some great outdoor views of the property, viewing the pool, and lawn and the golf course.  So
Manager Response: We are so glad that you felt like you were able to experience the best of California at Monarch Beach Resort. Thank you for your lovely review and please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Not what it used to be
Summary: I used to stay at this resort all the time when it was the st.regis and it was fantastic, back then. I gave this property a shot for my birthday week with my girl friend and everything felt off and service was poor. I booked the resort personally and told them it was for my birthday and also made reservations at bourbon steak and the beach club on my actual birthday. The first room they put me in was one of the worst rooms on the property (view wise). It was looking right into a residents garage and it was a corner unit that had three levels of patios looking right into our room. After many attempts to get in touch with the front desk they kindly moved us after a late lunch that we had to have off property (due to nothing being open but the pool cafe, which was at capacity and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I am sorry that your expectations were not met. I'd like to speak with you directly about your experience, if you would allow me the opportunity. Please contact me at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Overall, i truly enjoyed our stay. Great customer service. Staff are accommodating, friendly, courteous, and respectful. Thank you for the champagne on the house. You made our celebration extra special.  We will definitely come back with our kids and invite friends.   I hate to write this, but just to drop a note, insulation in our room is low. We can hear kids jumping from the top floor.   Thank you! We had an unforgettable time together. We hope to re visit sooner ;)
Manager Response: We are glad you had a nice time celebrating. Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write a review. We hope you return soon with your children and your friends.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: A great resort and location for trip with family friend.  Always enjoy this place and my husbands fav place in southern cal.  Despite all changes and mandates due to covid 19, the resort was able to create a pleasant environment for guests
Manager Response: We are honored to be one of your husband's favorite destinations in Southern California. We look forward to your next visit. Thank you for your review.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Very nice resort but better value at other resorts. We’ve traveled to many resorts and this one did not provide what you pay for. Drinks $20 ea., grab n go items triple normal prices, etc. Pool is amazing but on weekends is taken over and crowded by club members. Fitness classes are good but if my equipment is outdoors and separated more than 6ft apart why do I have to wear a mask? Beach is awesome and the gentleman who provides boogie board rentals is great! The steakhouse is a must! The beach bistro open only 3 days is great and should be open more. If you go as a family...recommend going to grocery store. Beautiful property. Shout out to beach rental equipment folks, Sam at the pool, Saul at the bistro, and Thomas and Lyle at Steakhouse!
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, had a great dinner at Bourbon Steak, and experienced our beach house hospitality. If you would like to connect directly about some of your concerns, I can be reached at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com

Summary Heading: Great but needs covid improvement - group sizing issues
Summary: Let me just start by saying that we had a great stay and everything felt safe, but one day at the pool. They rented out 4 cabanas to a HUGE party of 30 plus people. It’s a small pool area by the kid section and I felt it was irresponsible and very distracting to rent out all 4 cabanas to a large party in a small area. Made it impossible to distance yourself. It was far too many people to rent out to at once. I don’t complain but I did this time and they did NOTHING about it. We paid $1000 a night and felt like it wasn’t very responsible of them to allow that large of a party to take over a very small pool area.   With that being said, they should have rented out two of the 4 and stopped the party size to 15 or less.   Other than that, the rooms were awesome, food was 5 star.
Manager Response: We are glad you had a nice stay and enjoyed our beach house hospitality. I'd like the opportunity to connect with you directly around any of your concerns. I can be reached at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this property before and as always even after re-opening due to COVID-19, the rooms were impeccable and clean. The staff had great customer service at every level from valet service to concierge.  At the restaurants all waiters and waitresses were wearing masks and gloves. The distancing at the restaurants were much wider than the CDC recommended. At every elevator stop there were automatic no touch sanitizer stations. Inside the elevators the buttons had self sanitizing nano technology. The TV remote control inside the rooms were sanitized and wrapped.   Something unexpected happened and our room has changed its view. We were so sad as this was a very unique celebration of a critical medical recovery after an accident. Also we had difficulty getting a
Manager Response: We are thrilled you had an extraordinary stay. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Direct people with little kids to the kiddie pool
Summary: Love this resort!!  Service at the pool is always spot on whether it is getting towels, drinks, or food.  The main pool is consistently filled with kids playing screaming or crying.  Parents are oblivious. At the same time most chairs at the kiddie pool are empty and hardly anyone is in that beautiful pool.  Babies in diapers in the jacuzzis is both a health hazard to the children and to anyone else who comes in.  Pool staff needs to immediately take families with children to the kids pool when they come in the gate. Asked the manager and she seemed to think it was a good idea  Also need to be consistent about the mask policy. The rule is 6 feet apart or where a mask - not both.  Masks are required at the spa pool and outdoor gym where everyone is 6 feet apart but not one person
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I'd like the opportunity to connect with you directly about your concerns. I may be reached at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Not up to COVID cleanliness expectations
Summary: We took the kids for a trip to this resort this past week to take a break from being stuck at home.  When we checked into our one bedroom unit, we could tell they made some efforts to show extra care had been taken to clean the room (including a taped seal on the door that had to be broken upon entering the room).  The room was a good size but we almost immediately noticed that the table underneath the living room TV was filthy and there were obvious food/water stains from prior guests.  We called the front desk and they sent a team to wipe down the area again as they did not have another room available for us to move into.    Over the next two days, we noticed a few additional things including a half used bottle of lotion in the bathroom amenities and a used keurig pod sitting
Manager Response: I am sorry your visit didn't meet your expectations. I would like to connect with you directly about your concerns, if you would give me the opportunity. I may be reached at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: A fabulous stay at The Monarch Beach Resort
Summary: We were celebrating my Retirenent  We were celebrating my retirement of 43 years in the medical field.  Our favorite beach resort in Southern California is The Monarch Beach Resort. From the moment I called reservations and spoke to Bernice a Wonderful vacation planner at the resort to the end of our stay everything was perfect.  The cleanliness and COVID 19 practices are top notch.  Service could not be any more gracious.  They truly take care of their guests with heart.  That was true from my first call to reservations.  Bernice gave service with her heart and genuine Pleasure to help make this celebration special  Thanks again to Bernice and all the employees who made us feel truly welcomed
Manager Response: Congratulations on your retirement! We are so happy that we are your favorite beach resort and that you had such a welcoming experience with our team members. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: The Monarch did not disappoint. Living in LA county my husband and I usually frequent a closer ocean front resort rather than doing the drive to the OC. With LA being a hot spot for Covid 19 these days we thought it might be worth the trip to the Monarch. My expectations were pretty low, due to the crazy times we are presently living in HOWEVER The Monarch Beach Resort did not miss a beat. The biggest evidence is their consistency with their customer service. From our bartender/server Nick at Aveo Table, Christopher the manager at the Part & Parcel, Shawn at the pool, Ysobel at Bourbon Steak ( food was amazing here) Nicole at the front desk and a huge shout out to Christopher at The Monarch Bay Beach Club who went way over and above. It was because of these individuals and the
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed our beach house hospitality. Thank you for your amazing review and we hope to see you on your next staycation.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We had a two night stay at the Monarch, wonderful staff and great restaurants! Beautiful grounds and accommodations, nice location, close to shopping and sight seeing. There are two restaurants inside the resort, one at the beach. The tram service to the beach is a short drive, chairs, umbrellas and towels are provided there. The two pools are overlooking the golf course and have an ocean view, great cocktails at the pool bistro are available there, as well as private cabana.  All together we had an amazing stay and would come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad that you had an amazing time and look forward to your return.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We fully enjoyed our day with beloved family. The service is delivered with promptness, attentiveness and respect from the valet to the Beach Club. The rooms are fresh clean and tidy as well as the whole resort . We feft comfortable and safe to enjoy ourselves w/o worry during Covid19 season . The property is spacious and stunning views all around doesn’t feel crowded . Who wouldn’t want to leave ? Thank you 🙏🏽
Manager Response: We are glad you had a blissful stay. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We come to the area frequently for an area horse show.  Being that this was our first hotel stay and trip since the Covid-19 shutdown, I wanted to be extra careful. I reviewed the Monarch's policy on-line prior to arriving to know what to expect. We arrived on Wednesday for a 4-night stay.  Perhaps since we checked-in during a slow day, we enjoyed a lovely welcome from the valet, the bell man, and the front desk. We had a beautiful and spacious 1 bedroom suite with 2 full bathrooms.  The elevator has self-cleaning buttons (not sure how that works) and signs are clearly displayed everywhere indicating social distancing spacing. We enjoyed delicious meals at Aveo and Bourbon Steak, plus Bourbon Steak take-out one evening. Greatly appreciated the outdoor gym.  The attendants there
Manager Response: Dana L.   Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review. I would like to connect with you directly with your concerns. You can reach me at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Mixed feelings (Didn't feel safe with Covid-19)
Summary: The room was great, the location of the property is amazing. Dinner at Bourbon Steakhouse - was delicious. But all these good things were overshadowed with a lack of care about the pandemic. After reading the website about all the measures that were taken we hoped that it would be a safe and nice vacation after 4 months in a lockdown, but that was not the case. No social distancing, nobody cares when people walking around without masks, the pool area was packed with people and literary nobody was with a mask. Yes, there are posters everywhere about social distancing and a requirement to wear a mask but these rules were not enforced at all. Maybe, during normal times, this would be a 5 start vacation, but during the pandemic, I would expect much more (in terms of COVID-19
Manager Response: We value your input and thank you for taking time to share your comments.  Safety is our top priority and we have gone to great lengths to introduce high standards of cleanliness, sanitization and physical distancing.  I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you about your visit and if you are open to this, kindly contact me directly at mkrebs@monarchbeachresort.com.  I look forward to connecting, thank you.  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: My family and I came here for a nice, relaxing vacation and so far it has been terrible. Valet parking was very confusing and once we got inside to check in it was an absolute nightmare. First our credit card declined even though we had enough funds to pay for the stay. So we called the bank and the bank said the transaction went through, so we went inside and tried it again. Again it didn’t work and my kids and I were getting very frustrated as this was very stressful start to our vacation. Finally the card went through, but check-in wasn’t till 4:00 which this was not stated previously. Then we were headed back to the car to get some food because we had a few hours to check in and the valet lost our keys. It took forever for the valet workers to give us back our keys!
Manager Response: Linda Mayfair,   Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I would like the opportunity to connect with you directly to learn more about your concerns at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Anna at the front desk is a sweetheart. We arrived early expecting to go to the pool and she was able to get us checked in. Even behind the mask we could tell she was smiling. Jason the manager at the pool was beyond accommodating in trying to find us a spot. Robert, our server, was awesome and attentive. Additional staff was helpful, engaging  and friendly. The food was delicious. We stayed at a nearby hotel a couple weeks prior, there is no comparison, this property was clean, prepared and beautiful.
Manager Response: We are thrilled you enjoyed our beach house hospitality and hope you return in the near future for another visit. We appreciate your review.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: A hotel geared more for its club members than paying guests
Summary: My family were very excited to experience Dana Point and a get away during the current pandemic and the idea of staying at a  Star resort and enjoying its amenities was something to look forward to. When we arrived we were greeted with smiles and helpful valet staff and the lady on the front desk was very welcoming. Our room wasn't ready so we went to have lunch at Aveo, which was very enjoyable. Once our room was available, that's where one could tell the price being charged was way over the top. Our room, a Signature one bedroom suite, was in major need or refurbishment and updating. The suite had 2 telephones, one of which did not work at all and the other only if it was on loud speaker, thus I was forced on several occasions to call the front desk on my cell phone. I
Manager Response: We are sorry that you were disappointed. I would like the opportunity to connect with you directly about your concerns at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Thank you!   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort, but a Lot of Work Fixing Glitches
Summary: This is a spectacular property on a bluff, with a lovely golf course sloping down to the ocean. You can walk down to the beach, but it's much more comfortable to take the tram. At the bottom is a wonderful little private beach club with bar, outdoor dining, and chairs, umbrellas and towels provided. Did not play golf, but LOVED the beach club, large salt-water pool (not too deep), and 2 large hot tubs. Food and drink service at the pool was also tasty and convenient. Top-notch service from all employees.  We booked 2 rooms next to each other, and loved the balconies and luxurious, deep soaking tubs, with separate showers. Great beds too. Some of the furnishings were a little worn and dated, and mini fridge was full of items for purchase, so hard to use to store your own items.
Manager Response: Helen K. Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are happy you had a wonderful stay and it sounds like you truly enjoyed the pool and the beach club. We do apologize for the issue with your minibar items and please let me know if you would like to connect with me directly on any other issues at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com   We hope you return for another vacation soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We came to escape the heat, and once again, the crew at members services delivered. Given all the new regulations, they made our stay incredible. We didn’t need to leave the resort. Can’t wait to go back!  Thank you everyone at Monarch for making our stay special. Kaitlyn and Makenna for all the suggestions and reservations. Ted for the great service at the beach club. And the rest of the staff for a great experience. We will see you again in a few months!
Manager Response: We are pleased you had such an incredible stay. Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Please visit again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Had such a lovely breakfast and lunch at the Aveo Restaurant.  We have frequented the resort many, many times over the past 5 years and so love the staff.  They are friendly and always so attentive.  We especially love, Giuliani, who always greets us at the restaurant with a smile and a sweet spirit.  We will continue to go back and enjoy the resort.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Kathy Kunzi,  Thank you for being a frequent guest at our resort and for your great review. We hope to see you again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: We’ve stayed at Surf & Sand and the Ritz Laguna Niguel the last few weeks, and Monarch has been the BEST so far. The room is beautiful along with the property. They’ve moved the restaurant out on the huge deck with options for dessert/drinks by the fire-pits. The best so far given all the virus restrictions. (No to-go bags of food necessary, unlike the other hotels). The bed was like sleeping on a cloud, with Miraval Spa bath products for the perfect-sized tub. Breakfast in bed on a decorated room service cart with a hotbox, perfectly warm. Even the valet guys were nice and down to Earth. Monarch felt like the true hotel experience we’ve been looking for all summer.
Manager Response: Melissa,   Thank you for your kind review. We are glad you enjoyed the heavenly bed,  outdoor dining experience, and drinks by the fire. We hope you return soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This is our families 4th time there THIS YEAR! It is incredible the staff are so caring and really want you to feel special. Kori Walker makes sure we have our reservation made to tee. She went out of her way to make us feel special when my husband had been dealing with some family stuff.  The food is delightful, the pool stunning, the grounds are picturesque, the beach calm and peaceful.  It’s honestly amazing to go to such a big place and feel SO special. Thank you MBR. We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Suzanne M.,   We really appreciate your review. We are so happy that you and your family always enjoy your stay and that you visit us so often! Thank you for choosing us as your "home away from home".   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: Fantastic experience overall. I wish I didn’t have to check constantly the charges ( overcharge $80 at Bourbon restaurant, parking fees not waived as package described, 100$ Daily resort fee Offer not fully applied , etc..)
Manager Response: We are glad your experience was fantastic overall. However, we do apologize for the mistakes you encountered, and would appreciate the opportunity to discuss with you further. I can be reached directly at MKrebs@monarchbeachresort.com  Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic Escape to a Beautiful Resort!!
Summary: We spent a few nights at this magnificent resort and have nothing but fond memories. The rooms were spacey, well maintained and we had an amazing view over the golf course and ocean. There is a great private beach and beach house that is spectacular. There is also a great coastal walk that you can do. The pool is beautiful and inviting with attentive service.  But the main reason we enjoyed our stay so much was the formidable staff. Excellent service with a smile, always helpful, never intrusive.  It's a challenge during this Covid time for all of us and there is no "playbook" on how to manage reopening a resort with all the new rules for social distancing. They are doing their best with what they have and that is noticeable. Great job!  Thank you all for making our stay an
Manager Response: We are so happy that we have been a part of your fond memories. We appreciate your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager

Summary: This resort and amenities are fantastic.  We got away for 2 nights and enjoyed the pools, beach, restaurants, grounds and overall tranquility of this amazing resort.  Thank you Monarch Beach Resort for providing my kids and I will some peace during these hectic times.
Manager Response: It makes us happy that we were able to provide you and your family with some peace during these hectic times. Please return again soon.   Markus Krebs General Manager
