Summary: As you know by now the St. Regis is under renovation. The pools and the spa were both closed for renovation. It was still to cool to use the pool anyway. The grounds are beautifully kept and the staff was a friendly as anywhere I have ever stayed. There are great restaurants on property if you don't want to venture off property. The room was freshly remodeled and very nice. The only reason I am not giving an excellent review rating is the construction combined with the prices on food and drink. I understand that you don't expect good prices at luxury resorts but a $35 for two drinks and a $200 breakfast seems a little excessive. Given that however I would stay her again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear mjbinkc,  Thank you for posting about your recent stay at The St. Regis Monarch Beach!I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope we will have the opportunity to welcoming back to our Beach House on the Coast in the near future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Big rooms, nice patio bar.  UNDER CONSTRUCTION
Summary: Rooms are big but décor is a little boring.  huge bathrooms.  Pool area under construction, so the grounds are not in great shape.  Shuttle to the beach is a nice touch and the beach itself is fantastic.  Service was good an non-intrusive.  Would go back when the renovations are done.
Manager Response: Dear Aftimous,  Thank you for posting about your recent stay. Summary Heading: It was all about the Room!
Summary: The hotel was under construction with renovations and the main areas were crowded and noisy. I had been warned about this so was not at all disappointed. We were celebrating our 35th anniversary in CA and took a night to visit Dana Point. I had consulted with the hotel before making my reservation and went with their room recommendation. We were delighted!!!!We were at the far end of the hotel away from the hubbub and our room was amazing. The bathroom was huge with a sizable shower and a separate tub and two separate sinks. Our spacious room had a extremely comfortable king size bed, a seated conversation area as well as a fainting couch. In addition our balcony over looked the golf course with views to the ocean and Catalina Island. We enjoyed our sunset with a bottle of CA
Manager Response: Dear Lu P.,  We are honored that you chose to celebrate your 35th anniversary at The St. Regis Monarch Beach. I am thrilled to read about your great experience at the Resort and we hope to have you back soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary: Stayed here in November for a short Girls’ Weekend to celebrate my birthday. Although the resort was under construction, we did not feel like we missed out on anything. It was a great place to relax and unwind. The rooms were spacious, clean and very luxurious. The view from our room was very peaceful; we even had a seagull or two join us in the balcony for morning coffee!
Manager Response: Dear KCShousha,  I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to our Beach House soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary: One of the best things about this 5 star hotel is the access to the ocean and the private beach club that has fantastic food and great service.   The hotel is under a remodel so the pool area wasn't available during our visit however we plan to return.  The butler service was above and beyond wonderful.   The experience was seamless.
Manager Response: Dear TammyCritch,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary: I stayed in this hotel for 5 nights. Room is good but the in room dinning is terrible!! I talked to the duty manager but he didn't care I ended up ordering from dominos pizza!! Valley parking is fine but the hotel is crowded and noisy.  Will never stay again.
Manager Response: Dear mohed50,  Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. I am deeply sorry that we were not able to meet your expectations during your recent visit. I would welcome an opportunity to discuss these issues with your further if you wish and can be contacted at 949-234-3301.   Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: My wife and I met dear friends for a much-needed relaxing weekend get away.  The experience was simply unforgettable!  Brittni Sneyd Guest Historian, St. Regis Guest Liaison was incredible.  She saw to it that our stay was exquisite.  One of the most magnificent rooms we have ever stayed in!  Kyle Nations at the front desk also saw to it that our every need was met well beyond our expectations!  We will be back!  Many thanks to rest of the support staff that made the stay everything we could have imagined and more!
Manager Response: Dear Greg K.,  Thank you for staying at The St. Regis Monarch Beach. I am very pleased to learn that our team provided you with exceptional service throughout and thank you for the kind words and lavish praise you bestowed upon our team - I will share your good feedback with our associates.   I hope I will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future!  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Amazing Amazing Amazing..my husband and I stayed here for 4 days, and i have to say other hotels should follow there lead.  There was construction going on while we were there but it didn't distract from the beauty of the property it is Amazing and at night the guest mingle in the hotel lobby where drinks and food is offered with a live band and DJ.  There's a balcony right off the hotel lobby that over look the Pacific Ocean breath taking views..and if you can afford it you can get rooms with the same views.  The surrounding neighborhood is more of the up scale class homes in the area in the millions adding to the beauty of the resort  The staff/ Valet was the most professional pleasant people on earth, i have never meet people so happy about there jobs but i guess working at a

Plus, we just opened our new Health Club Facility, furnished with state-of-the-art fitness equipment.  Miraval Life in Balance Spa as well as Aveo Table + Bar and our pool area will follow soon. Summary: Currently under going a major renovation.   If you are interested in using the grounds prepare to be disappointed.  My wife and I chose to invest in a stay there for our anniversary,  only to wake up and find the pool totally closed and green construction netting for our view.   Would gave been nice to be notified in advance and presented the option to cancel should we be planning on using the full facilities but I guess that would be too much to ask from a 5 star resort. Given what they are asking for in terms of cost I would hope they would do the right thing.  May choose The Ritz next time?  That being said the staff was amazing so this review does  not reflect on them,  just the management.
Manager Response: Dear Bryan P.,  Thank you for staying with us recently and I am sorry your stay was not what you had hoped it would be. This is certainly disappointing to read, and I hope you will accept my most sincere apologies for this.  Our public space renovation is scheduled to be fully complete by the end of May and I hope we will have the opportunity to welcoming back to experience the fully re-imagined resort and the five-star amenities.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location for a short trip
Summary: This hotel is at a great location overlooking the ocean. They rebuild the pool and garden part as well as the spa. The service is very good, typical St.Regis. Maybe it's missing the personal touch a litle bit but overall very good. The rooms are big but the garden rooms don't have a good view over the ocean. The quality of the room furniture is good, it my opinion a little out dated. The bar is nice, the terase is great. The prices are high but the service and products are good. Overall a nice place to stay for some days.
Manager Response: Dear Hahee,  Thank you for your recent review on TripAdvisor. I appreciate you taking the time to detail your experience, and I am pleased that you enjoyed your visit.  I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back to our Beach House in the future!  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: A wonderful location for an anniversary or any celebration!
Summary: My husband and I went recently to the St. Regis Monarch Beach for our wedding anniversary. Our stay couldn't have been nicer.  The property is beautiful, the room was deluxe, and the staff was so friendly and helpful - from the reservations people on the phone to the front desk, to the servers at the restaurants, and everyone in between.  We went to lunch at the Monarch Bay Club on the beach and our server surprised us with a delicious and beautifully presented anniversary dessert.  Later that day we returned to our room to find a plate of delicious chocolates and a bottle of champagne. The staff was so thoughtful and friendly.  We went for drinks in the lounge overlooking the grounds and ocean and it was a little chilly out.  Our server brought over a cozy blanket for us.  The
Manager Response: Dear Wendy T.,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay at the St. Regis Monarch Beach. I appreciate your kind comments; our staff has a commitment to each and every guest to create a discreet experience of bespoke service.   I am pleased to hear of your exceptional visit and hope we will have the opportunity to welcoming you back in future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: I had the pleasure of spending the last three nights at the St. Regis Monarc Beach Hotel. This is truly a beautiful property set on an even more beautiful location in Dana Point. The service from the front desk, to both restaurant and guestroom staff were excellent. I look forward to returning next year.
Manager Response: Dear ZacandCar,  I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back to our Beach House on the Coast for many years to come.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 3 days on a business trip and it exceeded my expectations. The resort was really nice, very clean and had incredible views of the ocean. The room was one of the nicest hotel rooms I have stayed in, that included a great walkout balcony overlooking the gardens and pool area. Location was good but not right on the beach. There is a short 10 minute walk to the beach or they have shuttles provided as well. It was on the expensive side but the experience was worth the price.

Summary: We experienced exceptional service from the St Regis.  It is all about the experience in life and people you encounter.  The room was one of the best laid out and upgraded amenities made our stay very comfortable.  The renovation that was taking place at the hotel didn't not interfere at all.  The Hotel Guest Historian Brittni Sneyd had reached out to us before we arrived and made us feel welcome even before we got there and was very accommodating with requests.  And we made friends with Alfonso he was a tram driver, he made us feel as if he was our personal driver. Thanks to both! The Monarch Beach Restaurant  ocean front is delicious and what better place to watch the sun set!
Manager Response: Dear Cyn L.,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay at the St. Regis Monarch Beach. I appreciate your kind comments and hope we will have the pleasure to welcome you back to our Beach House on the Coast in the future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Memorable business trip to Orange County
Summary: I have had the opportunity to stay in St. Regis Monarch Beach for 4 nights in February this year. Everything from check in to the room was impeccable. The lobby bar as well as the Stonehill Tavern are highly recommended. Sensational views from the Terrace, unfortunately not enough time to enjoy the surroundings of the hotel. The only 2 downsides for me were the fact that the pool area was being refurbished at the time and construction work started early in the morning - however the hotel management had a very decent offer for a repeat stay (even though I have no idea when or if I'm coming back). The other fact was breakfast - I thought the breakfast menu was very short and at the same time quite pricey, even for a 5 star resort. All in all it missed 5 stars from me because of
Manager Response: Dear dxbresident,  Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary Heading: Ruined my daughter's birthday while staying here during the renovation
Summary: This is a great property. One of our favorite properties in the world. Stayed here many times and I gave it excellent reviews before. A picture of the resort used to be on my spg platinum card. I recommended this property to countless friends and partners. I decided to stay at the resort for my daughter's birthday. Bad decision. First, I made the reservation using the fine hotels & resorts program. No one told us the property is undergoing a major renovation. I called a couple of days before to confirm my reservation and ask for an upgrade. No one mention to me that they under reno. We arrived at the property and to our surprised the beautiful lobby is boarded up. Check in is in a very unwelcoming tent. No room waiting for us. We almost 3 hours to get a room. It was after 6:00pm
Manager Response: Dear TonicTravelAmeniti,  Thank you for providing your honest feedback and please accept my sincere apology for the disappointment you experienced, not acceptable by any standard.   I am deeply sorry that we were not able to meet your expectations and would welcome the opportunity to discuss your concerns with your further if you wish. I may be reached at 949-234-3301.   Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: We booked a room at the St. Regis knowing that the pubic areas were under construction (pool, spa) but were nervous as to how the stay would be. I am thrilled to say the stay was perfect! The service is top notch, the food was fantastic and the noise that was happening right out our window went unnoticed. The newly renovated room was exceptional and the bedding was 5 star. We had one of the best nights sleep we have ever had in a hotel. Again I have to say the construction was going on right outside our window and we did not hear a thing. We are so excited to go back when the spa and pools open up. Well done!!!!
