Warmest Regards,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: I came here with my Dad on a father-daughter getaway.  The service was incredible! In particular, S Saul at Motif and Kelly at the bar restaurant near the pool were incredible servers.  They really made the experience excellent.  I recommend this hotel for any family vacation!
Manager Response: Dear mill811,  Hearing feedback from guests such as you is one of the many reasons our staff members are so proud to be a part of the St. Regis. Thank you!   I look forward to having you return for many years to come.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice but not as nice as expected
Summary: Rooms were beautiful but VERY noisy.  Heard workers moving stuff outside at 4:00 am.  Supposed to be nicer than the Ritz next door but not hardly. Food was good, pools ok. Shuttles to beach!! 1 1/4 mile walk to beach.  For the price I expected more.
Manager Response: Dear blueladdie,  I truly appreciate you taking the time to detail your experience as it helps to improve our guests’ experience. We clearly missed the mark with providing you with an exceptional experience during your stay with us - please accept my sincere apology!  blueladdie,I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future to providing you with the true St. Regis experience. Please feel free to reach out to me directly with anything you may need in the future: 949-234-3301.   Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Great spa and lunch outside.  Had a nice workout before having jacuzzi and massage treatment.  Beautiful views of adjacent golf course and ocean in the distance.  There is a shuttle that takes you to the beach.  It doesn't make stops every hour so pay attention to the schedule.
Manager Response: Dear Dakineguy,  Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary Heading: The absolute best address is the St Regis Monarch Beach
Summary: The St Regis Monarch Beach is the best hotel we have ever stayed at. The grounds, the rooms, the staff, the food.....but especially the staff. They don't miss a thing. Every staff member you encounter goes out of his or her way to make you feel very special. And the chefs at Motif and Stonehill Tavern are superb. There just are not enough adjectives to describe the St Regis Monarch Beach. We have stayed at the St Regis many times over the years and it's simply an amazing hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jack R.,  I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary Heading: amazing and beautfiul hotel, friendly staff, gorgeous
Summary: Loved this beautiful bright clean hotel! The property was gorgeous and well kept.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The room was large bright and had a patio/balcony overlooking a beautiful view.  We had a double bed room and it was plenty large enough for my 2 kids and husband and me.  The staff was nice to point that we could use the fridge for our own waters, snacks, etc. The room bathroom was large and nice.  The only thing I didnt like is the bathroom had shutters that led to the bedroom (over the tub) so hard to get privacy in there if the kids wanted to open the shutters from the room side (can't lock them from the bathroom/tub side).  The turn down service was nice and they left chocolates.  My husband called concierge/front desk about kids club as we had seen on the
Manager Response: Dear shopaddict,  Thank you for your recent review on TripAdvisor. I truly appreciate you taking the time to detail your experience, and I am so pleased that you had a wonderful visit at The St. Regis Monarch Beach in California. I do want to apologize for the lack of knowledge and follow-up regarding our kids club and amenities, I will share this information with our team.  I hope I will have the opportunity to welcome you back to the best address in the near future!  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: A very nice rest at calm resort
Summary: Dana Point is a nice place to visit to see a bit of the luxury living in the L.A. area. St Regis is a nice resort with nice rooms and great food, good service. Sure it´s fantastic if you´re a golfer but it cannot be compared to other St Regis resorts where we´ve stayed or some other resorts. It´s good but not excellent.
Manager Response: Dear ppsthlm,  I appreciate your kind comments regarding our guest rooms and grounds and certainly hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly if there is anything I may be able to assist you with. I can be reached at 949-234-3301.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Spent 4 nights at the hotel. Lobby is very grand where you can see the ocean. It was a bit chilly while I was there so didn't get to enjoy the pool. The room size is on the smaller side compare to US hotel rooms. However, the bed is wonderful. I love the firmness of bed and high thread count sheets. The bathroom is very roomy. Brunch is wonderful but change location on sunday. I would definitely come back again and hopefully weather is nicer on my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear nycfashionlover,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay at the St. Regis Monarch Beach.   I hope I will have the opportunity to welcome you back to the best address in the near future!  Warmest Regards,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: The St. Regis Could Be So Much More
Summary: Honestly, I prefer the Ritz Carlton on the ocean side. The St. Regis could be so much more. To my knowledge, they don't have a program to support the local patrons business like the Ritz. My wife and I will occasionally go to the St. Regis lounge, but are not crazy about their pricing or their pours. The rooms are nice and we have stayed there on several occasions. The grounds are beautiful. Again, for a property with this much potential, it could be so much more!
Manager Response: Dear 1Honeymooner,  Thank you for your valuable feedback and taking the time to post your comment. I am disappointed to learn that we are not your number one choice in Orange County. Please know that I will meet with our team to review and discuss your comments.  Starting November of this year, we will renovate not only our main entrance and lobby lounge, but also our pool area and other outside grounds. This is an exciting time and I hope we will have the opportunity to make the St. Regis your number one choice in the future with our new product and services.  Please feel free to reach out me directly if you need anything in the future. I may be reached at 949-234-3301.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very comfortable and private.  It is relaxing.  The sunday brunch is to die for, I go there just for the brunch and the view of the water.  The pool is immense and the staff is very helpful. I would continue to be at the St. Regis for all of my California stays.
Manager Response: Dear ScottHoag,  Thank you for your compliments! Indeed, our Champagne Sunday Brunch at Motif Restaurant is a favorite for guests and locals. I hope you'll make the drive to Dana Point again soon!  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: This hotel is a nice consistent facility. The rooms are nice and clean and have good space. Breakfast buffet at Motif is above average but very very expensive for $33. Should be priced about $20. Can of coke at store is $3. Some pricing like this is just out of line. Kobe burgers at lobby bar are amazing!!!  American Express fine hotel program is pretty much worthless here.
Manager Response: Dear golfer6666,  I am pleased to hear your overall experience was excellent and I look forward to sharing your kind comments with our staff and leaders. The food and beverage pricing is calculated based on location as well as competitive set, keeping 5-Star / 5-Diamond service and presentation highest priority.  I certainly hope I will have the pleasure to welcome you back to the best address in the future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: We couldn't decide on which hotel to stay at and because of the trip advisor reviews we went with st Regis and not the ritz. As far as our room selection I felt like I was fooled in the overly exaggerated description on the hotels website. I booked a room with an "ocean view" you pay about $200 more for that thinking you will have one of those rooms that over looks the entire ocean. Unfortunately their idea of ocean view is from the corner or your eye if your lucky on a clear day. It was really a golf course view room. Totally disappointed. The room was good in size ...kinda old ... The pictures look better than the reality of course. They did accommodate our early check in request which was nice. We tried to go down to the pool around 12 and there were no seats available for
Manager Response: Dear Oanush,  Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay at the St. Regis Monarch Beach. Although I am pleased that you have shared some positive comments about your experience, I am disappointed that it was not a flawless stay for you.   Please know that Starwood and the St. Regis are entirely committed to an environment for our guests and associates that is void of any form of discrimination or harassment. I am extremely sorry to hear that you feel that way and would like to welcome the opportunity to discuss this with your further if you wish and can be contacted at 919-234-3301.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Wow!!  Simply incredible golf. The course was in great shape and the staff was very friendly. There are a few tough holes and the greens were rolling pretty fast. One hole has an incredible ocean view and you look over the beach. Nothing like hearing rolling waves as you play. Just an incredible experience.
Manager Response: Dear Michael F.,  Thank you for your compliments! I am pleased to hear you enjoyed golfing at Monarch Bay Golf Links.   Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Picture this while standing on the balcony of the main building:  you’ll see a courtyard, then a swimming pool, then the fairway of a golf course & then the ocean.  See the pic below.  We stayed here for 5 nights and the resort was very busy on our first two nights.  The staff however did a remarkable job in keeping up specially the valet attendants.  The gym had adequate equipment & roomy enough.  The cold towels are always a nice touch.  There a couple of swimming pools to chill: 1 lap pool for adults & another for everyone else.  The latter is rather small-ish & can get crowded when the resort occupancy is high.    But if you’re a beach lover, head over to the beach club either via a shuttle or walking leisurely for 15+ minutes.  Beach chairs are provided for resort guests
Manager Response: Dear Itchyfeet024,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay at the St. Regis Monarch Beach. I appreciate your kind comments regarding our spectacular guest rooms and the magnificent views from your balcony.   I am pleased to hear of your exceptional visit and hope we will have the opportunity to welcoming you back in future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely but not up to St. Regis standards
Summary: A very friendly welcoming staff – a very good program for my grandchildren – beachfront restaurant excellent – service at the pool excellent – attractive place to stay. The negatives are: they put us in a room and after we unpacked we heard the jackhammers above us doing alterations which were going to continue for a week. We did get another room but this was inconvenient and I can't understand why they put us there in the first place. Failed to give us turndown services 2 nights until we requested it. The Butler service was terrible – the Stone Hill Tavern restaurant food was terrible and service mediocre – they told me they were reserving a room for my son's early arrival and then someone gave it away. Everything worked out with too much time spent on these items.
Manager Response: Dear EdwinHochberg,  I appreciate your comments, especially as it helps to improve our guests’ experience. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience and discomfort you experienced. I will share your feedback with the involved departments, for further investigation, review and training.    Please allow me the opportunity of discussing your comments further so that we can examine the issues which you have noted. I may be reached at 949-234-3301.   Kind regards,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: I can't imagine anyone criticizing anything about this resort! It was really amazing!! The location was beautiful, the facilities were wonderful, the rooms were recently renovated and gorgeous. The staff could not have been more gracious.  The only downside is when you have to leave.  :(
Manager Response: Dear angie54,  I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary Heading: Doesn't Get Any Better Than This
Summary: We spent 5 nights in a deluxe coastal view room. The room was beautiful, spacious and well appointed. The furnishings are current and tastefully done. The hotel itself is gorgeous and the grounds are amazing. The pools and beach area were perfect. The food is pricey but plentiful and tasty.  What really makes this hotel are the people . They are courteous, warm and friendly. We used the overnight valet ( ouch $40 per night) but each time we retuned we greeted by a sincere "welcome back" and each time we left we were asked if we needed directions to our destination.  Our servers at the restaurants were helpful and wanted to make sure we enjoyed every meal. Even the house keeping staff who did turn down entered our room with a smile and warm hello inquiring how are day went. This
Manager Response: Dear LEMJAM,  I am thrilled to learn that you have had an exceptional stay with us and that we were able to exceed your expectations. We do have an incredible team and I am very proud to read your comments and compliments!  I hope I will have the opportunity to welcome you back to the best address in the near future!  Warmest Regards,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Brought my parents to California for an adventure that was packed with non stop travel in the Golden State. We began at the St. Regis. My 2nd visit here. Wonderful staff. Was hoping for a suite upgrade for SPG Platinum, but no such luck. It was a great room. However, I received same size room with a much better view back in 2009 when I wasn't an elite SPG member. The beds are great. Love the balconies. Bathrooms are incredible; almost as nice at St. Regis Deer Valley and Atlanta. Remede bathroom amenities are always nice. The room wasn't ready upon check in, so we received drink vouchers and waited in the lobby overlooking the pool, golf course, and Pacific Ocean. What a view! We had dinner reservations for Stonehill Tavern that evening. What an experience! I had the lobster pot
Manager Response: Dear KEEPTAHOEBLUE_NICE,  Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience; as a valued SPG Platinum member, we truly appreciate your feedback. Although I am pleased to learn that our team provided you with exceptional service throughout your stay and that you enjoyed the hotel, I apologize that we were unable to upgrade you during your recent return visit due to our occupancy level as we offer Platinum guests upgrades to best available room or standard suite whenever available. I certainly hope, we will have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: We are currently here for a 5 day amazing adventure. We could not have asked for anything more out of this truly unique and outstanding resort!! Our room is stunning. The views from all over this resort are amazing. The restaurants and bars are excellent. Dining is really second to none. The pools and spa are so relaxing and luxurious. The best thing though soy wife and daughter say is the staff. They could not be any more friendly and helpful if they tried. We are having a wonderful time. 4 days into our 5 day stay. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Charles S.,  Thank you for the incredible compliment! Hearing feedback from guests such as you is one of the many reasons our staff members are so proud to be a part of the St. Regis.   I look forward to having you return for many years to come.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Spent the day here last week, on business
Summary: Great locale,  Fantastic food  and close to everything in South OC. I liked it so much I booked another seminar for next month.  This is a great location for meetings. Their AV equip is top shelf and the amenities are  the best on the south coast.
Manager Response: Dear Chad G.,  I am thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable business trip. Thank you for sharing your experience, and I look forward to have you back to the Resort soon. Please feel free to reach out me directly if there is anything you may need.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary: This hotel is probably the nicest hotel I've ever stayed at.  We are Starwood Gold members and upon check-in, we were notified that we had received a multi-tier upgrade to a ocean view suite with butler service!  The staff was truly professional and on top of every last detail.  A special thank you to Katarina for being such a wonderful server at the pool.  She went above and beyond the call of duty for us. Hope to be back soon!!
Manager Response: Dear TravelerMD.,  Thank you for staying at The St. Regis Monarch Beach during your visit to Orange County, Califonia and for the kind words and lavish praise you bestowed upon our team - I will share your good feedback with our associates.   I hope I will have the opportunity to welcome you back to the best address in the near future!  Warmest Regards,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: You won't want to leave...the service is THAT good!
Summary: I live local, but have stayed at this resort a few times and it's always been great. Nicely renovated rooms, helpful staff. Over the last weekend (6/26/15) our family stayed here and we visited them at the pool and for dinner a few times. I would just like to call out 2 people who made our family's stay even that much better.  Sam in the valet area always made sure our car was close by since we were just on the property for short periods and remembered us every time. His personality is so welcoming! Also, Katrina at the pool is probably the best server I have ever had poolside. She was so attentive and made us completely feel at home. She made sure our drink orders were perfect and that we never wanted for anything. I could go on and on, but the bottom line is that I live less
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer F.,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary: Cannot imagine a greater degree of service, high quality or better amenities. This hotel is my favorite of all the properties in which I have stayed.  The staff is highly professional, extremely customer focused and interested in assuring that each guest optimizes the St. Regis experience. The room was as comfortable as it was spacious.  The turndown service from the slippers next to the bed, the bottled water and television set to a calming channel played throughout the room and bathroom. The only disappointment on this property was the patrons that failed to clean up after their children's messes in the restaurant and public areas.  This experience exceeded expectations and the met them.
Manager Response: Dear Megkellercogan,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay at the St. Regis Monarch Beach. I appreciate your kind comments and certainly hope I will have the pleasure to welcome you back to the best address in the future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic server at the pool! What a great personality! Very good at recommending beverages and food choices! Was spot
Summary: We had the pleasure of staying at the St. Regis Monarch at Dana Point California. We were there three nights and four days. Katerina was the hilight of our stay. We saw her every day and she was always alert ,warm and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear phil762015,  Hearing feedback from guests such as you is one of the many reasons our staff members are so proud to be a part of the St. Regis. Thank you!  I look forward to having you return for many years to come.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Had a great weekend here and enjoy the grounds. I was a little disappointed the pool was packed both days and I had to find other things to do. My room was fantastic and I loved it though and really enjoyed the other facilities. The brunch was also great.
Manager Response: Dear Jayda L,  Thank you for your recent review. Although  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, I am disappointed that you didn't have the chance to enjoy our pool area. We actually plan to expend our pool area during the renovation process (starting November of this year) and should not have any issues in the future.  I hope I will have the opportunity to welcome you back to the best address in the near future!  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: We love staying at the st Regis monarch  Beautiful hotel and such hospitable staff Everything is always first class so we were shocked to discover that they no longer have "on demand" movies. We look forward to Watching movies & relaxing after a day at the beach & pool  Th st Regis needs to bring back in room movies
Manager Response: Dear GiaTurn,  Thank you for your incredible compliment and your loyalty! We indeed made the decision to remove the "on demand" movies with the restyling project of our guestrooms; however we do offer DVD player and a wide range of movies upon request. Simply let our reservations team know that you would like this to be in your room when you confirm your reservation and we will arrange accordingly!  I look forward to having you return for many years to come.   Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: This is a fantastic, 5 star resort with all the amenities. It has a beach, a golf club but my favorite is a bar of course, the one by the main pool (there are 3 pools), ask for Clark and get a Trader Vicks Mai Tai - I have had MaiTais all over the World and he makes one of the best, trust me! And he is awesome company, with service and stories to match the quality of the cocktails - thank you Clark, 5 stars all the way! :-)
Manager Response: Dear GuilhemLA,  I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. Clark is true star and I am very proud to read your note. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary: Spent a few days at the resort with a 17 month old child.  I expected the worst but the hotel staff were most accommodating by scheduling room cleaning around our nap schedule and providing a refrigerator for milk etc.  In addition, the beach area and shallow pool made it possible for all of us to enjoy the facility and include the little one.  We will not hesitate to return.
Manager Response: Dear smenkus,  I am thrilled to learn that you have had an exceptional stay with us and that we were able to exceed your expectations. We are a family oriented resort and love to have our little guests enjoy a day by the pool!  I hope I will have the opportunity to welcome you back to the best address in the near future!  Warmest Regards,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Recently stayed at St. Regis for a work function, interactions with at least 10 separate resort staff and all were incredibly attentive at every turn with all requests.  Rooms are luxurious with high end finishes including the bathroom.  All rooms appeared to have a balcony as well including large (likely 80") flat screen LED TV's. Boutique resort with boutique shops (i.e. Cartier's), felt a bit out of place as normally wouldn't opt for such an exclusive property but staff was warm.  Saw several families during my mid-week stay although kids seemed out of place given the exclusive feel of the property, likely because mid-week rates were lower.  Fitness center and easily rivaled any full service gym I've been.
Manager Response: Dear Rigi34,  I appreciate your kind comments regarding our spectacular and newly restyled guest rooms and the different resort outlets and our grounds. Our staff has a commitment to each and every guest to create a discreet experience of bespoke service. I am pleased to hear of your exceptional visit and hope we will have the opportunity to welcoming you back in future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: I stayed there a while ago. The resort was beautiful, and the service was fantastic. I really liked their golf course, and the private beach, which you needed to get on their shuttle to get to.  The whole small town was also a nice place to visit.
Manager Response: Dear Yan_Don,  Thank you for your compliments of The St. Regis Monarch Beach. I am pleased to hear you had an exceptional stay with us.  I look forward to welcoming you back to the best address in the near future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Visited the property for a one night getaway with my best friend. The staff was amazing and the property was magnificent. The room was very very clean and up to date. A HUGE plus was the fact that there is a 24 hour swimming pool. Props to Nicole at the front desk and Daniel from the restaurant for being outstanding employees. I would recommend this property to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear Kat H.,  Thank you for your compliments of The St. Regis Monarch Beach. I look forward to having you return for many years to come.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Amazing service we got on our business trip with LegalShild company at Motif restaurant by one of waiters, his name is Eminque (Sorry, if I spelled wrong). His professional attitude and kindness were amazing. Thank you very much!
Manager Response: Dear Greg0457,  I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us and thank you for your nice comment about Enrique. I will share you nice feedback and hope we will have opportunity to welcome you back to the best address in the near future!  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic Staff; Fantastic Rooms With Very Comfortable Beds And Pillows; All Food Massively Overpriced
Summary: If you want 5 star staff, 5 star rooms, and 5 star comfort you will not be able to do better than the St. Regis, Monarch Beach.  Unfortunately, if you want the most ridiculously overpriced food you have ever seen you will also get that at this location.  From a 17 dollar grill cheese to a 25 dollar cheeseburger to a 42 dollar per person breakfast buffet you need to bring your Brinks truck or your rich uncle to be able to afford to eat here.  Every other aspect of this experience could not be any better, but unless you are the Sultan of Brunei you likely can't afford to eat here.
Manager Response: Dear David C.,  Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay at the St. Regis Monarch Beach. Although I am pleased to learn that our team provided you with exceptional service throughout your stay and that you enjoyed the hotel, I am disappointed to read about your frustration regarding our Food & Beverage pricing. We pride ourselves with the best quality food and our culinary team selects only the finest ingredients which may come with a little higher price tag. Please accept my apology for not meeting your expectation on this and feel free to reach out to me directly if you whish you discuss this any further. I can be reached at 949-234-3301  I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Unforgetable experience!Each year our family travels to a location for 1 week where we meet for strategic planning purposes for various family owned businesses. The past 3 years has been at St. Regis Monarch Beach Resort. In 2013 I submitted  a review on our first stay-"Horrible Experience" and it was. Shortly after the review posted the GM's office reached out to us and offered to make things right if we would consider a return visit.  In 2014 we returned unannounced to the GM and the experience met our expectations. It was a wonderful experience so much so we returned in 2015. We could not be more pleased. The staff on every level was exceptional from the concierge, business center, valet, housekeeping. I really want to relay the outstanding service and attention to detail by

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, ocean view but not directly on ocean
Summary: I recently stayed at the St. Regis Monarch Beach Resort.   The grounds are impeccable and staff just as good.   The hotel was chosen through work, so I didn't have a choice but very pleased with the property.   However, it isn't directly on the beach.  There is a walking path (about 10 minutes) or a tram which will take you there.   There are 3 pools, spa and great fitness center.   One pool is only for adults so the is a little break from all the families in the other pool if you want. There are four restaurants in the resort and I was a little surprised how expensive a few were.   The best option in my opinion is the Monarch Beach Club for dinner.  Great food and price point and this IS on the beach.  (Again, taking a tram ride to get there). This property is known for its

My room was around $300 a night and if you are gonna stay by the beach you are hardly even there I thought there would be more events/activities going on at the hotel that would keep me on property but unfortunately there wasn't and the staff didn't seem super friendly like you would expect from such a high scale resort

She said this is her first week on the job! Kudos to St Regis for having great people to make the experience even more awesome!

Summary: We had come to this hotel in the past many times to just have a drink and enjoy the ocean view as well as staying here the night of our wedding and wedding anniversary. The most recent visit was three nights last week for a trade show. It's a grand hotel and service is impeccable! The concierge service was excellent. The room was very luxurious and the price reasonable compared with other luxury hotels in the area like the Ritz. The bed and pillows were super heavenly comfortable. For our wedding stay,  we booked 2 big suites with a big balcony overlooking the ocean and golf course which was very spectacular, and some guest rooms had partial ocean views. All of our wedding guests were so satisfied with our choice of the St. Regis, and they did not want to leave. For our wedding

Summary Heading: A Great Resort and Great Restaurants!
Summary: The St. Regis lives up to its status as a great place to stay. The room and service is great. The bed is very comfortable. We have had both a pool view/ ocean view room. Take a walk in the morning down to and along the beach for great exercise with the ocean down below. The Stonehill Tavern has a great menu and recommended for a special occasion. The Monarch Bay Club is also very good. We relaxed at the pool one day and enjoyed the weather and the rest. Spend a couple of days and treat yourself to luxury.
Manager Response: Dear Jim P,  I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary Heading: 12th stay and it keeps getting better!
Summary: I have stayed at this property twelve times now. Its simply perfect which is why I can say its my favorite place in the world to stay. From the moment you pull up you are treated like royalty. Upon checking in, Colin at the front desk immediately connected with us over a personal loss we had mentioned, while we were seeking a peaceful getaway during this sad time he made us feel very special. Thank you. Once we arrived to our room, we noticed the beautiful redesigned room, I love the new color scheme! They even have iPhone chargers in the bedside tables, nice touch. We then went to our main pool cabana, the pool service was attentive but unobtrusive. Robert didn't let 30 minutes go by without checking on us and making sure we had anything our hearts desired. The price was $500

Summary: Just recently stayed 3 nights at the St. Regis. From the moment you walk in, in has a certain class and elegance to it.  Incredible customer service as there was always someone to help answer any questions or help with any issues.   The rooms were fantastic, VERY spacious and comfortable. No shortcuts at this hotel. Bar was fantastic, breakfast at Motif each morning was top notch.   The pool was well done and the golf course was in great shape.  Will be back and highly recommended for those who like luxury.  Room Tip: Ask for a room with a view, we didn't have one, but there are many that have great views of the golf course and surrounding areas.

Summary: The most beautiful hotel I have even been to. My Son had their wedding here. The hotel was so welcoming. . It was so relaxing to just walk through the pretty grounds.the view is breath taking. The golf course was so nice. The food was the best. They treat you wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Mary B.,  Congratulations on your son's recent marriage!  We are honored that your family chose to celebrate this milestone at The St. Regis Monarch Beach. Thank you for sharing your experience, and we hope to have you back to the Resort soon.  Sincerely,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary: My best friend had her wedding here so we stayed for two nights. Luckily we had a reduced wedding rate and didn't have to pay the $700plus nightly rate to stay here. I can see why the rates are so high because the service is outstanding and the resort was very well staffed. We were greeted by friendly guys at the valet and checked in by Ricky who immediately offered my kids a sand toy. Not one request was denied. I needed an early check in as I came with two little ones and they let me check in at 11am...normal check in time is not until 4pm so it was greatly appreciated. I requested an early evening turn down service and early maid service and they delivered. We ordered room service a couple times and the service was awesome but it did take long about an hour so keep that in

Summary Heading: Wonderful lunch and best view in So. Calif.
Summary: Joined my wife and son lunch for brunch at the Monarch Beach Club at the St. Regis in Dana Point on a Sunday afternoon... Very memorable experience, beautiful view of beach and ocean... Attentive service and very good food... Had artichoke appetizer and mixed calamari and fried octopus,,, Enjoyed one of the best Bloody Mary's ever... Prices moderate and VERY REASONABLE considering the location... Can't wait to go back!

Best Wishes,  Ian Pullan General  Manager

Summary Heading: Making memories at The St. Regis Monarch Beach
Summary: My wife Deborah and I are celebrating our 33rd honeymoon at the St Regis Monarch Beach and enjoying every moment of it. The best part of our entire stay has been the incredible St. Regis friends that we have met while we have been here. Having spent over 100 nights at Starwood properties last year, I can honestly say that the Monarch Beach staff, overall, is some of the best that we have encountered at any St. Regis, which is a obviously a very high bar.    We have talked to many of the people that staff this property and they are all excellent.  Kurt and Kimber, the floor managers, have been very kind to us.  Kori upgraded us to a great room and Kimber moved us to the “restyled” wing, which we highly recommend. Nevine covered our room in rose peddles and framed our wedding
Manager Response: Dear bobsT2615LH, we are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to meet so many of our associates. Thank you very much! Ian Pullan, General Manager

Summary: On arrival, we were immediately greeted with friendly Valet service and a lovely woman whisked our son away to pick out a sand bucket.   Our room was spacious with a great view.  The great points of the hotel included Valet service, Housekeeping (or butler service as they prefer), and the spa service/personnel.  It ended there.   All the restaurant/food services were horribly run. It was very dysfunctional and poorly serviced.  The hotel was very busy with weddings, which trumped the hotels attention to those guests.   They really lost sight of other hotel guests which were not attending a wedding.  Very disappointing.   I'm also used to high prices, as I live in a resort town, but the surcharges etc were quite high.  They have a great private beach which is not kept very clean,
Manager Response: Dear VailChic02, I appreciate your feedback. I am very sorry you experienced such poor service in our restaurants. We will shortly have a permit to allow us to remove the wrack (seaweed) from our beach which will dramatically improve this experience. I would be grateful for an opportunity to regain your confidence, please contact me directly when your travel plans bring you back to Orange County. Sincerely, Ian Pullan, General Manager (ian.pullan@stregis.com)

Summary Heading: St. Regis Monarch Beach Is Best Experience
Summary: My family spent the best 5 nights at the St. Regis-Monarch Beach. We are Platinum SPG and enjoy the finer hotels worldwide. My wife, who can be a bit critical said this was the best vacation we have ever had as a family!   High marks to the incredible staff and management at this great property. Special props to Nevine Sadala and Ms. Takas for the extra care and attention they extended to our family with accommodations in a beautiful deluxe room close to the Motif restaurant. We so appreciated the kindness to our son Lorenzo as he absolutely loved the whale!   This was our 5th year staying at Monarch Beach and hope to have many more.
Manager Response: Dear rbartone, I was so proud to read your note and look forward to welcoming you and your family back for your 6th stay in the near future. Thank you very much! Ian Pullan, General Manager.

Summary: Every year 3 girlfriends getaway for an over-nighter and this year we choose the St. Regis in Dana Point; It's close to home and we can carpool. This year I received an email from Nevine stating, "Please, allow me to make any arrangements for your upcoming stay". I gave her some background on our friendships (known each other since high school, all of us are married w/kids, etc....She suggested a few places to eat, what spa treatments were available and what the resort has to offer. We've stayed here  before and we knew that our resort fee included the use of the spa amenities. When we checked in they pulled up our reservation and welcomed us. The front desk handed us 1 free cocktail coupon for use (included in Starwood benefits) and noticed that Nevine made a comment about our
Manager Response: Dear Sheree G, I am delighted that our team took such great care of you and your friends for your girls night away. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon! Best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager.

Summary: We went to the St. Regis Monarch Beach with several other families for a reunion of longtime friends.  This is a HUGE resort which is sort of a drawback for me.  But despite the resort not having our pre reserved ocean view suite for us (accidentally cancelled by the hotel) and despite the fact that there were five weddings that weekend (one with extremely loud music playing outside our room at 9am on a Sunday morning!!) we had a nice time.  The service levels of the staff were awesome (butler service is a little over hyped ... sounds good but basically pointless).  The hotel wasn't able to give us the suite we reserved so we were very disappointed but the concern and care of the staff and the way they handled it somewhat made up for it.  The beach club is a pain to get to but
Manager Response: Dear Amy S,  Thank you for your recent stay with us! We are pleased to hear that our team was able to turn around your experience and that you enjoyed your time spent with us. We hope to welcome you back again for another memorable visit!

Summary Heading: Very Good but pricey, not for average Joe
Summary: Took my husband for his birthday. The staff was very welcoming and even gave us a free bottle of wine as token for his birthday. The reservation staff we had Jayson was very kind and accommodation. We had massages and that too was nice. The distance of the hotel from the beach was a surprise to me. I thought it would be right next door, but you have to take shuttle about 1.5 miles  from the hotel. So walking on the beach at night is out of the question. All in all a nice stay and facility
Manager Response: Dear Savvytraveler2014,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your husbands birthday with us! We will be sure to share your kind words with Jayson in reservations and hope to welcome you back again!

Summary: My first stay at a St. Regis in the states didn't disappoint. The location at Dana Point in southern Orange County is perfect for a lazy beach get-away with clear blue skies and ocean without the fuss of a major tourist hub.  What made it more enjoyable was that the hotel stay was partly free with SPG points and all the deluxe accommodations felt like a bonus instead of hole in my wallet. The hikes to the private beach were enjoyable. My kids brought pedal scooters (Razors) which they used to ease them along the way and allowed us to explore more of the grounds had they been on foot. The concierge service was excellent though not at the same level we'd expect from a hotel on par with a Four Seasons or Ritz.  The fine dining at the Michael Mina restaurant was the only experience
Manager Response: Dear lambsfeast,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for being a loyal SPG member! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time spent in Dana Point and that you were able to use many of the amenities which we offer. We hope to welcome you back again!

Summary Heading: Should of stayed at pelican bay or the ritz!
Summary: Wow, beautiful property, but the service didn't meet our expectations. While the valet staff, house keeping and the spa service were great!!!! They suffered everywhere else. The first night we had some Freinds from LA come visit and we tried to sit on their beautiful bar deck, found a great spot with couches, fire pit and outdoor heaters. Sat down no one came by. I went to the bar to get drinks and ask someone to come by with menus, no one arived, asked again no one , asked again no one, so went to valet and drove to Laguna. Next day Sunday brunch we go gown to the main brunch room and Ana the hostess very rudely said " this is our champagne brunch and its 97 dollars a person , were traveling with our four year old so I guess she tought we couldn't afford it. She sent us down to
Manager Response: Dear tomludwig, I was very disappointed to read your comments, will ensure the areas of concern you have raised are properly addressed. We take your feedback very seriously. I would appreciate an opportunity to regain your confidence, ask that you contact me directly when your travels next bring you to Orange County. Sincerely, Ian Pullan, General Manager (ian.pullan@stregiscom)

Summary: The resort was everything I expected, beautiful grounds and relaxing. The staff was very attentive and courteous. We eat breakfast at their Motif restaurant and everything was very good. I went jogging every morning by the library near by park and the beach and came-up behind the golf course back to the resort (approximately 3 to 4 miles). The weather was perfect with no rain and in the mid 50 to mid 60 Deg F.
Manager Response: Dear winguill, we truly appreciate your feedback. Monarch Beach is definitely a wonderful place for a run! Best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Hands down great location to bring your family and friends! The service and staff is impeccable - we've also done the ritz and montage in the area and we strongly feel that this specific property offers the complete package - you truly feel special and that you have arrived!   One of the main highlights is Anna Nicholas's great personality - superseded our expectations! Great staff member, super welcoming, personable - her personality made our dining experience an exquisite one every single time!   Kudos to st. Regis for hiring such great people and making the SPG members feel like family. Mahalo---
Manager Response: Dear Bigbistro,  Thank you for the kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at our resort and we will be sure to share your kind words with Anna. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: ...., but was worth it.  Thebreakfast buffet and the romantic dinner was to die for.  We loved it. My two teenage daughters enjoyed it all the way. The location is very close to the beach; its not beach front.  Comparable to Ritz a couple blocks away, but less expensive during the time we visited.
Manager Response: Dear luckydog172,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time at our resort and look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: The staff were amazing !! We really enjoyed our two nights here. The food was great to , only just a little pricey . We were there celebrating my birthday , they gave us a great room with amazing view!!
Manager Response: Dear Shiv0508,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us while celebrating your birthday! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Also,utterly amazing venue for a 30th girls weekend., we had the best time and the service was UNBELIEVABLE!!!! The food was over the top and the views were stunning. We ate at 2 different places and both were outstanding!!
Manager Response: Dear Ali T,  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your girls weekend at our resort! Thank you for choosing to stay with us while celebrating. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Very high experience here every time
Summary: Stayed here again (3rd time) for a business meeting. Staff is very friendly and try to make your stay memorable even when it's for a business function. The facilities are top notch. Beautiful outdoor pool area and high quality food and beverage options throught. Premium rooms that are comfortable and spacious. Beautiful bathrooms. This is really a premium experience every time I visit.
Manager Response: Dear rikwynn,  Thank you for the kind words! We are so pleased to hear that you have enjoyed your stays with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again, whether it be for business or pleasure!

Summary Heading: Nice property, a bit crowded maybe
Summary: Stayed one night here to get away from the hustle and bustle of LA. Check-in was a bit of a mess, long lines and no sense of who was to get called next to the check-in desk. I didn't see a dedicated SPG (Gold/Plat) check-in at the time. No room upgrade (although I was "only" Gold at the time so didn't expect it). The room was very nice and clean although the balcony furniture had excessive bird droppings on them to the point we couldn't use them. We witnessed the Champagne sabering and ended up "winning" the whole bottle(!) which was a great surprise. We had lunch, dinner and breakfast at the hotel and all meals were great. Spent some time at the pool which was pretty empty even though the hotel seemed at capacity. Pool attendants and overall service were great.
Manager Response: Dear caswede9,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us! We look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary Heading: Beautiful, Welcoming & Classy Hotel (but not Stuffy)
Summary: The hotel is absolutely beautiful, and the service is top notch.  Everyone we met on staff was very friendly, eager to help, and so polite.  It is very classy hotel but it did not feel stuffy at all but at the same time they took care of our every need.  The room we stayed in was an upgrade from a standard room and it was very spacious and even had a walk in closet (I loved the closet)  Our room looked over the courtyard, pool and off to the right you could see the ocean. The views of the ocean from all around the hotel were lovely.  You can see the ocean (and we were lucky enough to have a spectacular sunset one night) but the hotel it is not directly on the beach. They do provide shuttles to take you down to the beach and if you want a little exercise it is a beautiful walk.
Manager Response: Dear Loretta E,  Thank you for the wonderful review!! We are so pleased to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your time at our resort. We hope to welcome you back again!

Summary Heading: Would be 5 Stars if it were on the beach
Summary: This is a typical St Regis resort in that the service is top notch, the grounds are grand, and the facility is excellent.  I stayed down on the 1st floor and as I was checking out, the first floor was going thru a massive renovation - painting, new furniture, etc.  I'm not sure if they were going to close it down, but I hope that no guests were still staying down there.  There are multiple pools, but I spent my time at the lap pool in the spa area.  That pool has some tree coverage so a fair bit of debris falls into the pool by the afternoon (as compared to a clean pool in the morning).  The gym is nice but not great for a St Regis - the A/C is also not particularly strong in there, so you need all the towels they give you for all the sweat!  The bar off the lobby is nice,
Manager Response: Dear yangbness,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your room and were able to utilize some of the many amenities which we offer, including the lap pool at the Spa. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: One of our all time favorite Staycation Hotel and Resort
Summary: The St Regis Monarch Bay is always classy, clean, and beautiful.  They have consistently great service, food, and location.  The guests dress up to walk around in the lobby.  They have two pools, one for families with young kids, and one for adults.  They have a super cool beach club with full amenities.  We just completed the Mothers Day Brunch and weekend stay.  I highly recommend  Monarch Bay.
Manager Response: Dear NickellFamilyTravel, thank you for your wonderful feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back in the very near future. Sincerely, Ian Pullan General Manager.

Summary: My wife and I just returned from our "staycation" anniversary trip to the St. Regis.  We live close by and have a 2 year, but wanted to get away for a few days to be by ourselves.  A few days before we arrived, I received an email from Nevine, the guest historian, offering us curbside check in, if we needed any reservations to dining or any special requestions or occasions for our trip.  She took our info, including which car we were arriving in, and made arrangements for us.   We arrived around noon, and she was waiting for us at the front driveway.  We greeted us, the porter had our bags out of our car, and the valet took our car.  All this done in less than few minutes! Fantastic and so easy.  Our bellman, Rick, was great.  He took us to our beautiful room overlooking the
Manager Response: Dear rkmoy,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your anniversary with us! We are so pleased to hear that Nevine and the rest of our team were able to make it a special anniversary with lasting memories. We look forward to welcoming you both back again soon!

Summary: Enjoyed a really delicious Champagne Brunch at this hotel recently.  Food was of an excellent quality and the choice amazing.  Service was friendly and helpful, our outside table gave us a wonderful view of the property grounds.  A memorable visit.
Manager Response: Dear 5113,  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our legendary Sunday Champagne Brunch! We hope to welcome you back for another memorable experience in the near future!

Summary: I had a chance for a quick getaway . My last trip was a huge disappointment because service had slipped from the rocky valet to the front desk to the servers at the Bay Club. This time all was excellent but for the valet again.   I am sorely disappointed they can't get this right. They need a quick trip to Pelican Resort. They need to learn proper etiquette.  Starting with 'welcome sir to the St Regis.  Are you checking in'. Not 'hi are you here for a short while?'  Also upon leaving I had luggage stored and had to go have a quick lunch at Bay club. I had requested car ready up front by 2 pm and had given ticket to them before lunch as I had to be in LA with no time to spare. Returned from lunch and it wasn't there. By the time they retrieved my car it was another 20 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Tomk626,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that our valet team was not able to exceed your expectations. Please know that we will be sharing your comments with our valet team for immediate addressing. We were pleased to know that you were impressed with improvements throughout the rest of the resort and we hope to be able to welcome you back again!

Summary: From the second I walked in, the St. Regis was ready to go. The staff was superb and the food excellent. My room's view was so-so but that was due to my late booking and looking for a value oriented room. After all I'm here for the beach.   The in hotel restaurant of which I forget the name was easily my favorite part. Overlooking the pool and grassy lawn where weddings are done, the restaurant shined. My wait staff was named Jason a taller white guy with brown hair, and he did not know how to disappoint. His food service was exemplarary and his knowledge of the area superbe. Easily the best wait staff o have ever interacted with at a resort of this kind.
Manager Response: Dear Lemonz75,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort and will be sure to share your kind words with Jason. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I have stayed at this property now Three times. This time I was able to bring my wife. It is a stunningly beautiful hotel. The extremely large  rooms were just renovated which while a plus, but these rooms were always gorgeous. The views are spectacular. The food is excellent, this last time I was there for Breakfast and lunch on the patio overlooking the grounds.  My wife used the spa and was very happy.  I have walked the golf course in the past its appears very challenging but the once again the views are great. I strongly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Alan_Mindel,  Thank you for staying with us again! We are so happy to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your time at our resort and were able to experience many of the amenities which we offer. We hope to welcome you both back again!

Summary: We had the pleasure of another stay and, as always, we had an amazing weekend.  One of our best stays ever.  On this stay, we were in a St. Regis Suite, Coastal View.  This category is at the end of one of the two long wings and is on the bottom floor.  It has 2 full bathrooms (one with double sinks and a huge closet), a living area and separate bedroom.  On this level, it has one large terrace with doors off of both the bedroom and the living area.  The view is over the golf course to the ocean.  We had stayed in this room type before and didn't love it - I think it was a pool view one.  That type feels very enclosed because of where they are located.  But the Coastal View room was awesome.  We loved sitting on the patio and watching golfers, etc.  The room came with a butler
Manager Response: Dear SarahInSoCal,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your room view, the butler services, Spa Gaucin and out private Monarch Bay Club and beach. We look forward to welcoming you back again for another memorable visit!

Summary: A great hotel. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcomed. When I was checking in, I had trouble hearing the receptionist explain things because the lobby was very noisy at the time. I got a tap on my shoulder, and a hotel employee apologized for all the noise a group waiting to depart was making, I was so impressed he noticed my difficulty. He then walked me to my room.  It seemed that there were few staff members around, yet there was always one there when you needed one. Very polite and attentive.  We had lunch at Motif, and I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the selection, preparation, presentation and service.  As you would expect from a Five Star hotel. The beds were super comfortable, the rooms were nicely appointed, the WiFi was free, (I don't
Manager Response: Dear Nextboat,  Thank you for your recent stay and kind review! We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable time with us and that our staff was there to help make your stay memorable. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future!

Summary: We stayed 5 nights in April. Have stayed a few times before. This time room refurbishments were going on every day of our stay from 06:00 and throughout the day making sleep impossible and enjoying the Ocean room balcony pointless. No real concern other than three beers in an ice bucket sent to the room. Subsequent discount of $50 per night against a charge of $750 per night showed they failed to appreciate the room was not fit for the purpose. We were also given a voucher for a two night stay at the same hotel as if we had been given the Willie Wonka golden ticket. I suppose if we spend $12,500 in air fares and car hire we would be delighted. In any event many mails with Starwood Preferred Guests have resulted in patronising platitudes and no real acknowledgement of how
Manager Response: Dear alanrh2014,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We would like to discuss your experience further on the phone. Please call our Executive Offices directly at (949) 234-3301.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, wonderful food, perfect service
Summary: The hotel was perfect – our room was amazing – service was wonderful.  It is an incredible property.  We mentioned to the staff about our anniversary and they put a lovely rose and other goodies in our room for our anniversary.  We have been coming to the St Regis for many years.  We highly recommend it.  In addition, Chef Frank and his team are amazing at the Monarch Bay Club at the beach. The food was divine, view next to the ocean was beautiful and service was incredible – Savannah and Jordan, our servers and the whole team, were wonderful and made each meal a dining experience.  We can’t wait to visit St Regis hotel and Monarch Bay Club again.
Manager Response: Dear Ellen B,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review and for choosing to stay with us for your anniversary! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and dinner at Monarch Bay Club. We will be sure to share your kind comments with Chef Franc, Savannah, Jordan and the rest of the team at the restaurant. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: An outstanding weekend getaway with spectacular decor, beautiful views, and world class service. This was my first time getting a suit at a St. Regis and our butler supervisor Benjy was phenomenal, he went above and beyond to make sure our stay was a memorable one. I have stayed at several  resorts that had Concierge club level lounges but the Butler service was by far the best experience, with the best pastries, French pressed coffee to chaperonage at night for a toast before dinner.
Manager Response: Dear Stevohr,  Thank you for taking the time to share such a nice review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that Benjy left such a memorable impression. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I stayed at the St. Regis last two weeks ago and had a dinner at Motif. The food was above average, but Ruxandra made my experience one of the best ever, anywhere (and I'm 56 years old, and have been to a lot of places). I heard later that the night she served me was her first night as a server, and that other patrons had noticed the same about her that I had. I think she told me she was twenty years old. Amazing. She has "that thing" that is so perfect about anyone in the hospitality business-- that they don't even know how good they are.  I wish her well. I told her she will go far, and I know she will.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly G,  Thank you for your recent stay and kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We truly appreciate the kind words you shared about Ruxandra and will be sure to share them with her! We hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: Beautiful property and very nice room, but we paid for it so that's what we expected. At the price they charge, they should give us free in-room wifi and free parking. Self parking is a nightmare, you basically enter a dungeon, and you had to walk through all the mess to come up to the lobby, walking! You don't get in/out privilege so I had to pay $5 for my 30 minutes there to go out to get a $5 sandwich although I came back right away and stayed overnight. Another $31 to park my car. Ridiculous. It's not like downtown New York, you got free land everywhere, give your guests free parking!
Manager Response: Dear Jason Z,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that your overall experience at our resort did not exceed your expectations. We will be sure to share your comments regarding parking with our Executive Management team. Please note that we do offer complimentary internet to all guests and that only enhanced internet comes with a fee. If you have any other concerns, please feel free to contact us directly at (949) 234-3301.

Summary: Amazing. Phenomenol. Outstanding . Three words that barely touch on the real meaning of what a sensational 5 days we spent here. From the minute we pulled up in our car and were greeted by name to the minute we left there aren't enough adjectives to describe how fabulous the service and accommodations and the food are.   We booked on the phone with a sensational reservationist, Jenae, who made it EZ breezy to book this birthday celebration for myself and my wife.  It was the first time visiting the Laguna Beach area and we revelled in every minute.  The concierges,one of whom is Richard Branch walked us through paying for use of the toll roads.  He was beyond amazing. Restaurant selections both in and out of the St.Regis were memorable as well. Accommodations ( we were on the
Manager Response: Dear Shappy419,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your first trip to Laguna Beach. We hope to be able to welcome you back again for another memorable trip!

Summary: We stayed here in April to celebrate grandma's birthday. The hotel ground and room are fantastic and very well kept - our room was spotless. But what makes this property truly amazing is their 5 star staff, from Andrew at Valet all the way to Jacqueline at the coffee place and Anthony at the front desk. Any member of the staff that we talked to was always helpful, friendly and polite.   The Stonehill restaurant cannot be described, please have a dinner there and make sure you try the desserts. And if you are lucky enough to have Thomas as your waiter, then even better!  The Spa Gaucin was probably my favorite part... Natane welcomed us with a smile and a glass of champagne to have a birthday toast, the facilities are wonderful and my masseur Liviu was very professional and
Manager Response: Dear GaliaC,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your grandmother's birthday at our resort! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time spent with us and were able to experience many of the amenities which we offer. We will be sure to share your comments regarding Afternoon Tea with our Food & Beverage team for addressing. We hope to be able to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: We returned to celebrate our 3rd wedding anniversary, and the resort was just as we remembered it and then some. Our first stay was a gift from my sister-in-law, and this time we booked a St. Regis suite that included the butler service, and we were extremely happy with Giuliana, Steven, and Benjy who took care of us throughout our stay. Even our tram attendant Nick was so helpful in planning one of our evenings. We were lucky to have checked in when a big group had left and checked out prior to a few groups checking in, so it felt like your own private getaway throughout the property. The staff were always friendly and willing to accommodate whatever request. You genuinely felt they were happy to serve and provide the best experience. It was good to see them training new staff
Manager Response: Dear EarLAXPHX,  Thank you for such a kind review and for choosing to celebrate your anniversary with us! We are so pleased to hear that you and your spouse enjoyed another stay at our resort. We will be sure to share your kind words with Giuliana, Steven, Benjy and Nick!

Summary: Staff, Service, Food and Amenities all come together in what was a wonderful week.  The pool area is clean and well staffed.  The Monarch Beach club has great food, friendly service and provides a perfect place to see a sunset.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff K,  Thank you for your recent stay and kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our resort, pool and private beach. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: My sister and I took my mother to the Spa Gaucin for her birthday. What a wonderful experience we had! I must give a shout out to Jenevieve who went out of her way to make our day extra special. I have been to several  high end spas, and this one is incomparable.
Manager Response: Dear ashmom2015,  Thank you for the kind review of Spa Gaucin! We are so pleased to hear that Jenevieve helped to make your mother's birthday extra special and memorable. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: The hotel  is walking distance from the beach by way of some private and public trails. It's a great way to start the morning or end the day with a brisk morning walk or a calming sunset jaunt.  The hotel is beautifully designed and the rooms are quite large by today's standards. The furnishings are efficient but nothing special for a st Regis. The bath and shower/tub is spacious and well appointed.   There was work going on in the room above us.  Drilling, hammering and door slamming.  A five star hotel would have advised us but we had to call to find out what the commotion was about.  The staff was non chalant about it.   The valets are quite efficient and a personable bunch who make a great effort to give you a st Regis welcome.   We had coffee and light fare in their coffee
Manager Response: Dear Scoop1955,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed most of our facilities, but sincerely apologize that our service and breakfast buffet did not exceed your expectations. We will be sure to share your comments with our Executive Management team for immediate addressing. We hope to be able to welcome you back again.

Summary: Loved every minute of our 6 night stay. Beware though, Luxury does not come cheap!!  The staff were helpful and polite, the views stunning, grounds carefully maintained, and although the beach a short tram ride away very private with wonderful food at the cafe. The golf course is also top class. Was pleasantly surprised to see a top class hotel treat children so well rather than just tolerate them.  Our only complaint was the shower in the room above was noisy (our room 573), noticeable as it seemed to be in use either very early or late.  Otherwise this hotel exceeded our expectations and we would like to return.
Manager Response: Dear coatespl,  Thank  you for your recent stay with us! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed many of the amenities which we offer. We will be sure to share your comments regarding the shower above your room with our Engineering team so that they can address the noise issue. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable visit!

Summary Heading: Five Star Hotel with Great Service but no WOW
Summary: The Service and the people who worked at the St. Regis made it a Five Stars. The property needed some updating and they are taking care of this. The food was very good but not Outstanding.  My best meal was at the Stone Brewery about forty minutes away. The Stone Brewery was half the price and it was outstanding. The beach is not convent or close to the main hotel and the pool was nice but just didnot wow me. That sums up the resort very nice very expensive but just didnot wow me.
Manager Response: Dear JoeBobSki-Sail,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your time at our resort. We sincerely apologize that your stay did not exceed your expectations. We hope that the next time you visit us, not only will our staff wow you but our facilities will wow you too!

Summary: such a nice resort to visit good f and b outlets nice beach great staff good food very welcoming and good for family it was a great experience to spent time there if possible i would like to visit one more time ..... good job keep it up
Manager Response: Dear mc call M,  Thank you for the kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed not only our world-class facilities, but our amazing staff as well. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary Heading: Excellent Experience:  Expensive, and Worth It.
Summary: This is a five star hotel.  Truly. It was all very expensive, perhaps 2.0 or 2.5 times what you normally expect to pay for a room, or a glass of wine, or a salad.  But the service was extraordinary without being obsequious (which I really dislike); no-one was subservient, just open, friendly and helpful. We were there for four days, during which there was an endless stream of events and meetings and a very extravagant wedding for 700.  The arrangements all blossomed into life for each of the events and then, a couple of hours later, there was no trace.  Quite remarkable. It was very expensive, ...and I got all that I paid for.
Manager Response: Dear another_traveler0104,  Thank you for your recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your four days spent at our resort. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: First Class every step of the way!
Summary: I recently stayed at the St Regis Monarch Beach for 10 days with a large group.  The service and amenities could not have been better.  The staff went out of their way to please, and they extended every imaginable courtesy to the group.  The hotel and grounds are beautiful, the restaurants are fantastic, and the service is second to none. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a first class experience.
Manager Response: Dear Nick M,  Thank you for such a wonderful review! We will be sure to share your kind comments with our team. We sincerely appreciate you choosing to stay with us over such an important holiday and hope to be able to welcome you back again next year!

Summary: My wife and I just completed a 10 days holiday stay at the St Regis, Monarch Beach. What a fabulous vacation! I have stayed at a number of St Regis (and other Starwood) properties and I believe this is the most beautiful, best located, most comfortable – and perhaps most importantly – the one with the best staff. The things that stood out for us: The service and the genuine warmth of the entire staff. From the front desk reception to the waitstaff to housekeeping – everyone was attentive, gracious and efficient. The Room was spacious and beautiful and recently refurbished, I understand. Ask for one overlooking the pool and grounds. Really lovely.  And the food service – a shared responsibility with the Prime Experience organization of NY who provided the catering – was
Manager Response: Dear Axk001,  Thank you for sharing such a kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your vacation at our resort and appreciate you spending such an important holiday with us. We will be sure to share your kind comments with our entire staff and hope to be able to welcome you back again next year!

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel!!! My husband and I came here March 24-29 for my husband's business trip and I tagged along since my 30th birthday was the 27th. Upon check in I casually mentioned it was my birthday that week and somehow the bartender must have overheard me because later on when we went outside for cocktails he brought me chocolate covered strawberries with "Happy Birthday" written in chocolate on the plate.   The entire staff was so kind, attentive and went over the top to make our stay pleasant. Even the one minor issue we had was taken are of and immediately apologized for. We were waiting at the beach for a shuttle and there were so many people that the normal shuttles going back and forth weren't enough. So my husband called the hotel and
Manager Response: Dear VinnysMomma,  Thank you for taking the time to share such a nice review! We are so happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your trip to our resort and that you had a memorable birthday! We hope to be able to welcome you both back again soon!

Summary: Family stayed at the hotel for a week. Truly the best experience. The staff is always so helpful and ready to help. The rooms are very homey and the extra large bathroom is a plus!! The pools are beautiful and the views are stunning. I can not wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear daniellatzvi,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed our resort, rooms and pool. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary Heading: This place could not be more amazing!
Summary: This is probably the crown jewel among all St. Regis properties.  The location is lavish, and the service is first-rate.  Stonehill is easily one of the finest restaurants in Southern California.  If you have the opportunity to stay at this beautiful resort -- which has some of the best ocean views anywhere -- take it!
Manager Response: Dear Joel M,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and for taking the time to share your feedback with others. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time spent with us. We will be sure to share your wonderful review with our entire team and look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: This is a place that aims to please. Resort  staff at every level was totally professional and accommodating at every turn. Bartenders remember your name and drinks ( with special shoutouts to Denise, Blake and Clark). Restaurant servers make every effort to enhance the dining experience which was made easy by the delicious food and elegant setting. Resort was full with a demanding crowd and each and every person with whom I interacted made me feel like a special guest.  Setting is stunning. Even most basic rooms are very well appointed with super comfy beds and spacious bathrooms. Food and service at stonehill restaurant was exceptional. Pool staff was extremely gracious and accommodating. Will definitely find an excuse to return.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara H,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We will be sure to share your kind words with our team, including Denise, Blake and Clark. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: Despite living nearby my husband and I decided to spend our anniversary weekend at the St. Regis. We felt like we stepped into another world and didn't want to ever have to leave it!   Our room was magnificent! We had expansive golf course and ocean views with butler service and daily coffee in bed included in the rate. On our actual anniversary we found a bottle of wine and a cheese plate waiting for us when we returned from the beach and a special rose petal surprise when we returned from dinner.   We ate a fabulous dinner at Stonehill Tavern with delicious wine pairings and even some chef created surprises thrown in (not just an amuse bouche, but some lovely between-courses treats as well!). Jenny the bartender crafted a special cocktail for us to try when she learned it was
Manager Response: Dear BeachMom2012,  Thank you for choosing to spend your anniversary with us! We appreciate the kind review you left regarding your stay and will be sure to share your comments with our entire team. We hope to be able to welcome you and your husband back for more memorable getaways!

Summary: This property is by far the most beautiful resort in California. The food is delicious, The rooms are so inviting with speculator views and the customer service is by far the best. This resort is perfect for families or just a romantic getaway. Been going there for the last 12 years and will keep coming back for many more.
Manager Response: Dear 668larryf,  Thank you for the wonderful review and continued patronage! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your most recent stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Hotel is very nice but the service is not what it should be. We asked the concierge for a Dim Sum place and he said he would call back in 20. After an hour I called him back and he held me on the line for 10 minutes just to recommend the first place that came out of Google.  I ordered a package which UPS confirmed arrived there on March 30 at 9::35 AM. At 10:30 PM they hadn't located it so they said they would call back at 6. They didn't call and I had to leave to my flight without my package. After an honest displacement mistake they located it and told a friend they would send it back home to me. Today I received the tracking number. After they took a week to send it they still charge me for shipping? It's not what you should expect from a hotel of this kind. Very disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear crisaboumrad,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback with us regarding your recent stay. We sincerely apologize that our service levels did not meet your expectations, as this is not typical of our resort. We will be sure to share your comments with our Executive Management team for immediate addressing.
