If you feel there is anything further we can do, please reach out to us directly at (949) 234-3301.

Summary Heading: Luxurious getaway at one of the most beautiful properties in the USA!
Summary: My experience of coming to your property last weekend was so unique because you and your staff were so exceptional in your hospitality, warmth, and professionalism. My experience checking in to the St. Regis Monarch Resort was flawless.  Daniel did such an exceptional job of helping me book the reservation over the phone and then a very warm reception when we finally arrived and he covered all the bases from A-to-Z. Everything was seamless, smooth, and exceptional. The room amenity was greatly appreciated, the cleanliness, the friendliness of the bell staff that helped to settle us in. The hotel provided great service on every level and after 2 hrs of Spa treatments I felt like a King!  I feel like every little whim and request was honored by everyone of your team members and it
Manager Response: Dear BabaDas,  Thank you for sharing such a kind review! We are so happy to hear that you had such a relaxing and memorable time at our resort. We will be sure to share your wonderful comments with Daniel and the rest of our team. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Our weekend stay at the St. Regis is one of my favorite trips.  The property is absolutely beautiful; the grounds are meticulously maintained and the setting couldn't be better.  Service was excellent, staff is attentive to guest needs, and the food was great.  On our last day we had brunch at the restaurant by the beach which was highlight of the trip.  I would definitely recommend this resort to anyone looking for laid back California luxury.  Oh, and the bed is hands down the most comfortable I've ever slept in.
Manager Response: Dear Heidi H,  Thank you for such a kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at the resort and were able to experience many of the amenities which we offer. We hope to welcome you back again soon for another laid back California getaway!

Summary Heading: Only the actual property and its beauty qualify for good marks,,, then supporting employee staff is a fish out of water
Summary: For a 5 day stay in March 2015, I needed a very relaxing, high end place to be pampered and to enjoy. For the price, it may be the most expensive Hotel / spa resort property in all of Orange county ...the question is..IS IT WORTH IT?   MY overall person recommendation is that it is NOT. The place is beautiful..the property with the grounds, pools, golf course and access to local beach by tram is very nice for a visit.  a Wedding held there on the Saturday night was amazing to watch from my Balcony of my room.   so what is the deal?   Quite honestly , for me and my guests, its how you are treated that makes the difference. You can go to a 3 star hotel , but if the treatment is Amazing , then its enjoyable . on the flip side...you can go to a 5 diamond resort, pay well over $500 a
Manager Response: Dear Doug G.,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that your experience at our resort did not exceed your expectations. Your comments regarding the service which you experienced and the interactions you described with our staff will be shared with our Executive Management team immediately. Please know that this is not typical of the service levels which we strive to offer. In the meantime, please reach out to Ian Pullan, General Manager, at ian.pullan@stregis.com should you want to discuss your experience further.

Summary Heading: How is this a 5 star resort? It should be 2 at best!
Summary: The views, rooms and the property is gorgeous. We were there this week before another group had bought out the hotel and we were very disappointed by the service, food selection and how we were treated as guests. It took over 2 hours to have our luggage brought to our room so we went down to the pool and tried to order lunch at 11:30 and were told that the kitchen was backed up from breakfast and we couldn't order- with three hungry kids this was not ideal. We finally received our lunch at 1:15 but it was a VERY limited menu- the hotel was preparing for Passover so all items served to the group arriving in 4 days had to be kosher. While I understand this- why to guests paying $795.00 per night need to suffer? Only 2 of the hotels 5 restaurants were open by our last day. In
Manager Response: Dear jlp735,  We sincerely apologize that your stay with us did not exceed your expectations and do appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. Your issues regarding the dining options and staff interactions will be shared with our Executive Management team for immediate addressing. Should you wish to discuss these issues further, please contact Ian Pullan, General Manager, at ian.pullan@stregis.com.

Summary Heading: Still the Best!  (Even with some turmoil)
Summary: This is my 5th time visiting with my family and this property never disappoints!  I have to start with a couple of call outs.  Kimber and Kurt, both Managers, performed in a spectacular manner after an incident with an unruly guest who was abusive, loud and not very nice.  That person happened to be in the room next to me.  Kurt took quick and professional action to calm the situation for the night.  The next morning that person was shown the door.   As a platinum member Kimber immediately changed our room the next morning.  All of the staff is always helpful and courteous.  The rooms are exceptionally nice and very clean.  Staff enters your room 2x per day to make sure everything is just right.  The food in the hotel is prepared with care.  Whether you are having a burger or
Manager Response: Dear Brian B,  Thank you so much for your kind review and recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff, including Kurt and Kimber, helped to make your stay memorable! We will be sure to pass along your comments regarding the bars within the resort to our Director of Food & Beverage for addressing. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Attentive staff, gorgeous property, unbelievable brunch and terrific location all made for a memorable weekend getaway.  Well mannered, and wonderful staff could not do enough for us and every guest we encountered.  Although not on the ocean, the views were beautiful and the weekend was laid back, elegant and terrific all around.  Get an ocean view or at least pool view room and definitely go to the Sunday Brunch -- it is well worth the very reasonable $80.  OC at it's finest and take the 10 minute drive up to Okura for sushi,
Manager Response: Dear Lucas60763,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to share such kind comments! We are so pleased to hear that you had a memorable weekend getaway. We hope to welcome you back again soon for more relaxation, brunch and fond memories!

Summary: Whatever you do save your money and go to Marriott!! Most ALL restaurants on property closed. Resort ran out of food and the service is pretentious, just as the people who work there!! We were there for a wedding and honestly our time was ruined.... Nothing you would expect paying $600/ night. More like motel 6 service... Trust me when I tell you that you will be disappointed by staff, in particular Kimber, the front desk manager who was abrupt and full of herself.... We checked out on Sunday when our wedding party left and waited nearly 45 minutes in line for lack of service and employees just to check out, save your $$
Manager Response: Dear WellTraveledPersian,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that your time spend at our resort did not exceed your expectations. We will be sure to share your comments regarding our restaurants, food and staff with our Executive Management team for further discussion. Please contact us directly at (949) 234-3301 should you want to discuss these issues further.

Summary: visited with my college age son for his birthday. Thought it might be too relaxing for someone his age but he loved it as did I. Location was great with views of golf course and ocean from most of the common areas. The staff was very accommodating and made my son feel very welcome. Sometimes at hotels of this caliber young adults are not made to feel comfortable, quite the contrary here.The restaurants and bar were lovely. Our server, Sam, at the beach club was a pleasure. Pools and other amenities were exceptional. I will go back with my husband soon.
Manager Response: Dear LizaS210,  Thank you for your recent stay and for choosing our resort as the destination to celebrate your son's birthday! We are so pleased to hear that you both enjoyed your time here. We hope to welcome you back again for more memorable family celebrations!

Summary: We travel a lot and have high expectations - the St. Regis Monarch Beach far exceeded them all!  What a great experience.  The suite was awesome - beautifully decorated, large modern bathroom, and incredible view.  The dining, pool and drink options were also excellent.  We ate on the beach, at two restaurants in the hotel, the pool and in our room and always had great meals.  But my highest praise goes to the staff for their service.  The service we received from the valets, front desk, bartenders, waiters and waitresses, housekeeping, and especially the butler service made this a truly special vacation.  We cannot wait to go back.  For those looking to stay at the St. Regis I would give these tips.  First, the beach is a 5 minute tram ride or 10 minute beautiful walk but we
Manager Response: Dear Danny266, I our entire team will be so proud to read your comments. Definitely our goal is to always exceed expectations, I am so pleased that you experienced so much our resort has to offer. Our beach is truly the jewel is our crown! We hope to see you again soon, Ian Pullan, General Manager.

Summary: Absolutely lovely property, not the same view as the Ritz Carlton or Montage but much better in terms of service and atmosphere at pool area. Although service at pool can be slow due to lack of servers, it was wonderful. The prices are consistent with comparable resorts in the area. Given the choice, I would stay here every time. Stonehill Tavern is pricey, but excellent!! Staff could be a little for friendly for $700 a night but no one was rude at all in any way. Drinks should not take 20 minutes to receive at pool for any price but other than that, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear spgtraveler_11, I completely agree!! I appreciate your comments about our pool service and we do have a plan in place to address this. We look forward to welcoming back in the near future. Best wishes, Ian Pullan, General Manager.

Summary Heading: Not a 5 star experience at all...
Summary: So where do I begin... When you pay a huge amount of money for a room you expect a certain level of service... And they have failed on that spectacularly. From the crudités plate that had a rough chopped unpeeled dirty carrot on it, to the fact that they charged me 20$ for it even after I showed it to them. The fact that they absolutely refuse to give you early check in or late checkout, even when you are a SPG member.  This is not the St. Regis of a couple years ago... That level of service went out with the previous management. I suggest that the new management get it in gear and give the level of service that people are paying for or else there are many other high end hotels in the vicinity to choose from. Couple of other occurrences: 1. Never once saw the 'butler' that came
Manager Response: Dear MichelleG2626,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay. We sincerely apologize that your time at our resort did not exceed expectations. Your comments regarding the lack of service at the pool, encounter with our Manager on Duty, and the quality of the crudité plate which you received will be shared with our Executive Management team for immediate addressing. If there is anything else you'd like to share regarding your stay, please do not hesitate to contact our Executive Offices directly at (949) 234-3301.

Summary Heading: Beautiful room especially liked Whitney Corte our server at the pool
Summary: The staff is very attentive and professional. Pool staff went above and beyond. Whitney Corte not only did her job very well, she was also training another girl. St. Regis also has the best Red Snappers on the planet. Ariel at the front deskmwent out of her way to be accommodating and put me in a beautiful room with a view of the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear Denise C, Thank you! We will be sure to recognize Whitney and Ariel on your behalf. Our Executive Chef, Frederic was delighted to see your comments about his red snapper. My very best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: great stay at the st regis
Summary: so beautiful ,room was great,,pool and outdoors was beautiful..took tram down to the ocean amazing views and great place to eat...the spa was great...food very good ...employees go out of there way for you..st regis just pampers you all the way..
Manager Response: Dear jgraese, wonderful to see your comments about our pool, beach and spa. We are so proud of all our resort has to offer. Come back to be pampered again soon! Best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager/

Summary: This is definitely a favorite for us every summer, every few weeks.  It is a perfect get-away from busy LA or even for bringing relatives from out of town. It is like a mini vacation and a true haven. The resort is massive in size and has a few restaurants to choose from so you don't even need to leave. I read a review that compares it to a 3 star and that is absolutely untrue. The rooms have been renovated since we have been here last year ago, even though they did not need it. They smell fresh and new.  The hotel is on a golf course, so the beach is a 10 min walk or you can take a shuttle down for free. Guests at St Regis get access to a private beach and club and it is fabulous for a walk or dinner.  The sunsets are magnificent. During the day you might not even make it to
Manager Response: Dear Anita S, I truly appreciate your comments, completely agree our resort is exactly like a 'haven' here in Orange County. I believe you will also find our newly renovated rooms and suites even more relaxing! I do look forward to meeting you in person on one of your next visits. Sincerely, Ian Pullan, General Manager.

Summary: Stayed at the St. Regis Monarch Beach last weekend and it was grand!  Lovely grounds and the shuttle to the beach was fun with a nice bistro on the sand to enjoy the sunset.  Special thanks to Anthony who started out our stay so nicely and Devon at the Monarch Beach Club who answered all out questions and made up feel at home.  I can not say enough about our check-in (which I thinks sets the tone for the whole stay) and how helpful Anthony was and at what ease he made up feel welcomed to the hotel.        From housekeeping, staff behind the counter at The Crust Gourmet Coffee Shop, the Spa, Monarch Beach Club, the entire Valet staff, and of course the bar, we never received a faked or forced smile or greeting.      Also, there were two large events that were going on during our
Manager Response: Dear SeaBerger, I know our entire team will be incredibly proud to read your comments. Thank you! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon. Best wishes, Ian Pullan, General Manager.

Summary: I do not have a single complaint about this hotel. From the moment my family arrived until the moment we left we were treated with the best hospitality. We have also stayed at the Ritz which is less than a mile away and all agreed we enjoyed our time at the St. Regis more. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Jtnoss, I LOVED to read your note! I hope we will see your family back again this summer. You will get to experience our newly renovated rooms and lots of other exciting changes. Thank you very much. Sincerely, Ian Pullan, General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice stay but more along the lines of a 3 star hotel
Summary: We had just left the Camelback Inn in Scottsdale Arizona (which was absolutely gorgeous) and stayed here at the St. Regis for 4 nights.  Upon entering the resort it seemed very nice.  The rooms were a good size- we enjoyed having a balcony with a view of the ocean.  It was definitely a partial view.  I wouldn't pay more for a view as the resort sits a solid 10-15 min walk away from the beach, therefore your views aren't going to be "ocean side."  The one confusing thing about our room was the fact that you must hit a button by your door to have your room serviced as well as to receive turn down service in the evening.  I just assumed this would happen without having to remember to do this.  Everyday we would come back to our room around 12 or 1pm to it being cleaned which was
Manager Response: Dear Joy W, I was very disappointed to read your comments with regard to the service issues your experienced and failure to meet your expectations. I would appreciate an opportunity to regain your confidence in our resort, ask that you contact me directly when your travel plans next bring you to Orange County. We take this feedback very seriously. Sincerely, Ian Pullan (ian.pullan@stregis.com)

Summary: Stayed here with my wife.Everyone from front desk, maids, valet, golf course staff and food service in hotel always had a smile and "Hello"! Grounds immaculate. Restaurants and bars were good too. Reasonably priced compared to the Ritz. Will return soon with friends.
Manager Response: Dear jaye116, we are very proud of our team here, look forward to your return in the near future. Thank you! Ian Pullan, General Manager

Summary: We have been to many other luxury hotels and resorts around the world and haven't had the wonderful pre-arrival treatment like we have received at the St. Regis.  We had some reservation glitches but Noor, Dana and Shady have been wonderful in helping us figure things out.  If the rest of the experience is half as good as our treatment so far, it will be a great week.
Manager Response: Dear David I, I am confident you will have a wonderful stay. If we can be of any additional service with planning your trip, please do let us know. Sincerely, Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Top-notch service. Gorgeous grounds. Beautiful rooms.  First off, please understand that I don't generally throw superlatives around. If I'm staying somewhere "nice" then I fully expect to receive my money's worth. Too often, it seems like that's not the case. But not here.  The St. Regis Monarch Beach was perfect.   From the minute we arrived, the service was amazing. Our kids were greeted in the lobby and very well taken care of. I was actually a little worried about bringing them here (one is 4, one is 7), but the staff really catered to their needs - sending a few cookies up to the room, along with their own bathrobes. The boys thought that was just amazing - and so did mom and dad. (The 7-year-old also got a kick out of being called "sir"...)  The grounds are amazingly well
Manager Response: Dear justalittlecrazykc,  Thank you for such a wonderful review! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We truly look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights at the St Regis Monarch Beach and absolutely loved our experience.  The rooms are spacious and very comfortable, with great bathroom amenities.  The restaurants onsite are more than enough to not have to worry about finding quality offsite.  Our favorite restaurant is the Monarch Beach Club down at the beach.  Our waiter, Corey, was exceptional (on two occasions - lunch & dinner) and knew the menu in and out with great recommendations and wonderful customer service.  The beach at the hotel is great and as private as you can get in California. Golf was great but typical resort golf, not challenging but also fun and beautiful views. Everything was perfect!  We'll be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew W,  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time at our resort! It's wonderful to hear that all of the amenities which we offer helped to make your stay more enjoyable. We will be sure to share your kind comments with Corey and the rest of the Monarch Bay Club staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nicest Hotel I Have Ever Stayed At
Summary: Five stars across the board. Incredible accommodations, amazing views and location, super friendly and courteous staff. I stayed for two nights on business - I wish I could have stayed. If you have an opportunity to stay here, you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Patrickwinderl,  Thank you for your kind words! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: This hotel made my business trip feel like vacation!
Summary: I stayed at The St Regis for a business meeting and left feeling like I had, had a vacation. Facts: The property is a 40 minute drive (without traffic) from the John Wayne Airport. The service is above and beyond 5 star. The pool area is easily accessible and has a large kiddie pool. The hotel provides a free shuttle to their private beach. Food and drinks were a bit pricey but the quality was amazing ($10.75 for a draft beer). The hotel layout makes this very large property feel intimate. Every thing was perfect!!
Manager Response: Dear Krenos1, I am so happy to read you enjoyed your stay and you had time away from your work schedule to experience our beautiful resort. Hope to welcome you back soon!. Best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager.

Summary Heading: Best vacation by far with the best service
Summary: The breath taking view was extraordinary enough, but the service made it even better. One server in particular, Robert Felix, made our trip even more special. He accommodated to our every need and more. It just so happened we were talking about our anniversary when Robert overheard, and brought us two glasses of champagne and strawberry chocolates! He was so nice, and forthcoming he definitely deserves to be promoted to a higher position within the staff. He was by far the best server we have come across from all of our tips to different hotels, such as Europe, South America, and more. A very memorable experience!
Manager Response: Dear ccclc2015, we will be sure to recognize Robert for taking such great care of you and recognizing your anniversary in such a special way. I am delighted you enjoyed your vacation! Best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager.

Summary: The accommodations at the St. Regis are impeccable for large business functions. Very spacious layout, friendly staff, delicious food, and of course natural and architectural beauty. I had a chance to visit the Golf Links and Pro Shop, I only wish I had time to play a round. It was great to have been greeted by the GM when walking through the front door! Very well done. I look forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear BTidball,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort and that you felt our accommodations were impeccable! We hope that you will be able to join us again soon, whether for business or pleasure, and that you get a chance to play at our award-winning golf course!

Summary: We love this hotel -Breathtaking views - Wonderful Brunch - But most of all the Private Beach Club -Cocktails at Sunset- Great helpful beach attendants Engaging bartenders - Intimate Bar - yummy menus - we highly recommend you spend some time at the Bay Club during your stay.  Big thanks to Mgr Dan Murray for always assisting us in planning the perfect gathering.
Manager Response: Dear Linda B,  Thank you for your kind words about our private Monarch Bay Club! We love hearing that guests are able to spend time at the beach and utilize our exclusive facilities. We hope to be able to welcome you back again for another memorable visit!

Summary: A weeks stay on business and everyday was fabulous. The service was outstanding and rooms were spot on. Food is great. Ball rooms are a great size for any function you may have. Did I mention the service? Great employees!!!
Manager Response: Dear Dudemood,  Thank you very much for your comments. I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay.  I agree we have a wonderful team of associates working here, we look forward to welcoming you back in the very near future.  Sincerely,  Ian  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary: Ryan Adams took special care of our reservations. We were fortunate enough to receive a premium suite with a view of the ocean. Not only that,  we were welcomed with rose petals and drinks in our room! The staff was second to none when handling all of our needs from requested items, restaurant reservations, excursions and prime beach locations. Eric, who assisted with our luggage is a true ambassador for this property and a gem they must hold on to! I here the Sunday Brunch here is amazing, includes every breakfast item you could think of and items made to order. I didn't get to try it this time but will on my next visit. You and your spouse must experience this location atleast once in your lifetime. Loved my stay and hated to leave, will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear jackson2180,  Thank you very much for choosing our resort to celebrate your 20th Wedding Anniversary and taking the time to write a review for us.  I am delighted that Ryan, Eric and our entire team took such great care of you both.  Everyone raves about our Sunday Brunch and it recognized as being the BEST here in Orange County!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Best wishes,  Ian  Ian Pullan General Manager

Summary Heading: Motif Restaurant, St. Regis Resort is so easy to overlook.
Summary: There are so many excellent fine dining restaurants in the Dana Point area so it's easy to overlook the Motif Restaurant at the St, Regis.  Every time I eat there, I'm reminded of how good this restaurant is.  It has a beautiful view, excellent food and outstanding service.  I called the day before to find out what the menu was for 4:30 because we wanted an early dinner.  I talked to Alex--who took time to read the menu to me, and assured me the kitchen was very flexible, and would try to accommodate us if we  wanted anything other than the set menu. Everything was perfect from beginning to end-Shanna and Gerardo were our serving team, and we will be back again soon.
Manager Response: Dear Irene357, thank you very much for visiting our Motif Restaurant. I am very pleased that Alex, Shanna and Gerardo took such great care of your party. We will be sure to recognize them on your behalf and look forward to seeing you again very soon. Chef Graeme has just launched his new Spring Menu, definitely worth a try! Our very best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager.

Summary: Those of us that live in Southern California are very spoiled. We have more attractions in our region of the state then many states combined. But there's a special place; in fact a touch of paradise sitting right in Dana Point. The St. Regis Resort Sunday Brunch is a slice of heaven on earth. Attention lovers all over the state; you must take your partner(s) to this magnificent feast and ultimate relaxation spot. The grounds are amazing and the food is soo good! All cuisines are offered so take a huge appetite and your wallet. The price is a a bit heavy; yet well worth the experience. Trust me on this; everything taste better when it's free. Enjoy!!
Manager Response: Dear Fitforthesoul, Thank you so much for your wonderful comments about our Sunday Brunch. Best wishes, Ian

Summary: I had my birthday dinner here on 3/10/15 at the Motif and from the time we walked in and were greeted with the best of hospitality. We chose to sit inside at first because it was cold but then later moved outside to watch the sunset and listen to the music that was being hosted for a party. I want to say a big thank you to Graham the Chef, Jose the bartender, Gerardo the server assistant and the superviser Anka. Most of all I want ti thank Lisa and Steven... talk about humble, loving people who went above and beyond to make my birthday so special! I will definetely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Lovekmpm,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday with us at Motif! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your dinner. We will be sure to share your kind words with Chef Graeme, Jose, Gerardo, Anka, Lisa, Steven and the rest of our team. We look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary Heading: A good place to go if you're hungry.
Summary: The excellent service makes anything better there.  We had brunch and all stations were spotless. . They prepared the food the way you wanted.  The servers seemed to read your mind. If you wanted champagne they didn't stop pouring unless you asked them to stop.
Manager Response: Dear LUISE H,  Thank you for sharing such a kind review! We are so pleased that you enjoyed our legendary Sunday Champagne Brunch in Motif and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Favorite hotel in California outside of LA
Summary: When we come to California we usually stay at The Peninsula (which we love) we decided to venture out to the Laguna are and stay at the St. Regis. We were in a newly renovated room - which was gorgeous. I have to especially thank Melissa (the Spa manager) who made our stay even more memorable. I used the Fitness/Spa area and she took very good care of me and was beyond professional. The fitness area in the hotel is great - it is large, has more than enough machines, clean, and has it's own pool area as well (great for laps). The main pool at the hotel is stunning. The service is spectacular, the view is amazing (the hotel building itself is gorgeous) and the views of the ocean are great. We also love the fact that there is truly a seperate kids area - and that the kids are more
Manager Response: Dear lisawdc23, thank you very much for your comments, they truly made our week!  I will be sure to recognize Melissa for taking such great care of you. We are incredibly proud of our newly renovated rooms and have LOTS more exciting changes to come this year. I look forward to meeting you in person on your next trip to Dana Point. Best wishes, Ian Pullan General Manager.

Summary: Stayed at St Regis for 4 days.Although the hotel is not ocean front, there is easy access to the beach from hotel. Room was immaculately clean, service staff was so attentive. I never stayed at a hotel that provided such and excellent Service. From the time of check in to check out I was serviced like a royal.
Manager Response: Dear LaineyR4u,  Thank you for your recent stay and positive review! We are so pleased that you enjoyed our resort and legendary service. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Stayed here as part of a larger group for a corporate function. The hotel was amazing from start to finish.  All the staff were always smiling and friendly. (Extra shout out to Patrick the barman for being an all round gent). The room was huge and had a great view. It even came equipped with a chaise longue. I can't fault said chaise longue. Heated pool. Private beach. Swanky bar. Tasty food. The works.  You wouldn't want to be short of a few bob, but it really is some hotel
Manager Response: Dear Gary R,  Thank you for the kind review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at our resort and that our teams exceeded your expectations. We will be sure to share your kind words with Patrick. We hope to welcome you back again soon, whether it be for business or pleasure!

Summary: Had nice brunch at their private beach club.Nice park next door. Room service food is also good.   All the staff were so helpful. After we left I realized I forgot my phone charger in the room. Their lost & found dept promptly retrieved it and mailed it to my home.
Manager Response: Dear PIL2002,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to share feedback with others online. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort, our Monarch Bay Club and In-Room Dining. We're also happy to hear that our team was able to return your phone charger to you so quickly. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Completely lived up to my expectations
Summary: From the property, to the staff, to the comfort of the room, everything you would expect from a 5 start resort.  The on property restaurants were all great.  The views of sunsets are unrivaled, don't miss the opportunity to view them, while you are there.
Manager Response: Dear garhuff,  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time, and the sunsets, at our resort! We appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: What's great here? The bar - great drinks - the restaurant - fabulous - the cafe - excellent and the service - can't get any better. The gym, the spa, and the classes also were very good. The rooms are great, the amenities awesome and the staff is helpful and cheerful. What I didn't love were the prices - $14 for a juice smoothie? $20 for 2 eggs? Dinner for 2 in the $$$ range. OK, you're on a heated patio looking at the ocean but still... If you can get past the prices and that the good news is that the resort is self contained and you don't need a car - but that you are then a captive audience, then you're good. The walk to the fabulous beach, the pools all wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear joan g,  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our resort and amenities during your recent stay! Thank you for taking the time to share your kind comments. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: From the minute you arrive at the hotel, you feel like you are the most important guest there. Staff overwhelms the car taking luggage, welcoming you and directing you to the desk. There was no wait for check-in with at least 6 people ready to help guests. If you are a Starwood resorts member you entitled to 15% off everything except lodging, service fees and gratuities.   We had a ground floor room with a patio not facing the pool.  Our view was a grassy area that backed up to the parking lot where people exercised their dogs. Not very picturesque but quiet.  I would definitely ask for a room overlooking the pool or facing the golf course and ocean. The room itself was a nice size with a king bed and a large beautiful marble bathroom with separate shower and a deep tub.  The
Manager Response: Dear rwethereyet60,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort, our amenities and most importantly our staff. We hope to be able to welcome you back again, whether it be for work or pleasure.

Summary Heading: Good for groups - so-so for individual or couples
Summary: Traveled here for a 4 day conference.  Facilities are excellent and the food, most of which was served buffet style for our group was also very good, actually surprisingly good.  Room was very well appointed, including coffee maker (I noticed some reviewers complained that one was not available or extra was charged for one.)  The beach is a good distance away - about a 5 minute ride on glorified golf cart that runs every 1/2 hour.  The beach is OK - nothing special with  minimal amenities.  This is a five star resort expect five star prices.  Wine - screw top $18 a bottle at Sam's goes for $18 for a four ounce pour.  We did try the main lounge/ bar area for a pre dinner glass of wine and were disappointed.  They were setting up for a event by removing furniture, service was
Manager Response: Dear Greybrit,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your stay with us. We appreciate the comments and apologize that your time spend with us did not exceed your expectations. We will be sure to share your comments regarding your experience in our Lobby Lounge with our Executive Management team for addressing, as we do not want our guests to feel disappointed when staying with us. If you would like to share any further feedback with us, please feel free to contact us directly at (949) 234-3301.

Summary Heading: Dream Wedding at the St. Regis Monarch Beach
Summary: We had our destination wedding ceremony on Saturday, December 27th, 2014 at the St. Regis Monarch Beach (Botanical Garden) and reception right next door at Club 19. We worked directly with Kelly O'dell who made our wedding planning experience so lovely. We saw the venue once during labor day, walked through the requirements and we were sold! The venue not only fit our aesthetic, but it fit within our budget and Kelly was super flexible with our requests. We weren't able to go for a tasting but Kelly allowed our family members to attend on our behalf. She was super helpful, very responsive, knowledgeable and gave honest recommendations based on our needs. We loved working with her and don't know what we would have done without her.   As all of our guests were from out of town -
Manager Response: Dear leeserina,  Congratulations! We are so pleased to hear that your experience with us, both as a bride and hotel guest, exceeded your expectations! We truly appreciate you choosing to celebrate your most important day at our resort. We will be sure to share your kind review with Kelly, Judith and Christina, as well as the rest of our staff. We hope we're able to welcome you and your family back again for more memorable moments!

Summary: The staff at the St Regis made for a memorable trip.  Right from the start, Sam at valet made us feel welcome, check in was easy and friendly.  We dined at the Monarch Bay Club were the food was superb, our server Kerstin was knowledgeable and took good care of us.  The manager, Dan made sure everything was perfect for the anniversary celebration in our party.  We ended our stay with the amazing brunch on Sunday.  An amazing stay.
Manager Response: Dear bskcounts,  Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing such a kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff made a memorable impression on you! We will be sure to share your kind comments with Sam, Kerstin and Dan. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This is a 5 star resort with well appointed rooms and sumptuous grounds and public rooms. My favorite part of the resort is the private Bay Club with a restaurant and bar on the sand in a cove with tide pools. A free tram takes you down there every 15 minutes. There's lounge chairs and umbrellas as well as oversized patio chairs overlooking the beach. Service is excellent throughout. Very much a resort. The only peeve is the $30 resort fee (free internet, water and phone) and a $37 valet parking charge. Self parking is not much less. At $450 per night for a room, these charges are excessive. It's pretty much the norm all over.
Manager Response: Dear Hencat,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our private Monarch Bay Club and the beach amenities which we offer. We will be sure to share your feedback regarding the resort fee and parking with our General Manager. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Monarch Beach Club is worth the visit!
Summary: We had a wonderful gourmet dinner at the Monarch Beach Club recently. The staff was excellent, and the food was exquisite. The setting is beautiful- right on the beach. And of course we enjoyed dinner with a group of friends while the sun was setting. An intimate and lovely experience at the beach club, which is linked with the St. Regis.
Manager Response: Dear Marcie H,  Thank you for choosing to dine with us at the Monarch Bay Club recently! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at the restaurant. Sunsets at the Monarch Bay Club are one of the must-see's when visiting our resort. We hope to welcome you back again for another memorable meal!

Summary Heading: Not Punta Mita, but worth the visit.
Summary: Pro's: This St. Regis definitely has the best location, beauty and optimally positioned resort on Monarch Bay.  The room was pristine, large and beautiful.  Grounds and private beach club also a delight.  Drivers to the beach in their covered mega golf carts were all great conversationalists and thoughtful.  Cons: Pool staff needed a bit more training.  We stayed over Valentine's Day weekend, so there were crowds, but shouldn't change the fact that spilled salsa all over pool chairs should be cleaned up after an hour of sitting in the sun.  Their beach club staffing could've used a little more help since the day was so gorgeous, but was overall very friendly and helpful.  Another thank you to Manager Kurt Dietrich(sp?) and Anthony (for check out.)   They made our stay extra
Manager Response: Dear SolBriente,  Thank you for your recent stay with us! We appreciate your kind review and are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at our resort. Your comments regarding pool staff will be shared with our management team to ensure that the training is addressed and improved upon. We will also share your kind comments with Kurt and Anthony. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: My husband, three children under 10, my great aunt-in-law, and I all stayed at the St. Regis during the holidays in December 2014.  The service there was excellent and our stay was exceptional.  We called ahead to make sure that my great aunt (who had suffered from a stroke a couple of years ago) could be accommodated, and I have to say, that the staff at St. Regis did everything they could to make sure she was comfortable.  The food was delicious (though a bit pricey) and we were even able to sit outside for our meals with heat lamps though the nights were chilly.  The kids all received personalized cookies upon our arrival and we received a turn-down service each night.
Manager Response: Dear Aliya D,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during the holidays! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time at our resort. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: A few things to consider 1) great service from the moment you arrive until you leave 2) the food in the fine dining restaurant is exceptional and if you can sit on the balcony the views at sunset are breathtaking 3) the restaurant down by the beach is very good with excellent service, but walking is nearly impossible so you must wait for the extended golf-cart shuttles, which in the off season are few and far between 4) the images on the web make it look like the beach is closer than it really is; however, the views from the main building are still very good 5) the beds are simply THE most comfortable bed you can imagine!!!  Best nights sleep I have had in years and I have a great mattress at home.  I plan to return to do some whale watching, which is an easy drive from the
Manager Response: Dear MDM1414,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review of your recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our resort, enjoyed dinner in Stonehill Tavern and Monarch Bay Club, and were able to experience some of the amenities which we offer. We appreciate the feedback and hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The St. Regis is an extremely elegant hotel, with an eye for detail and attentive staff. From the drive up to the lobby through to the views from the outside dining venues and private beach, this was well worth the trip.
Manager Response: Dear NoWorriesTravel,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and for taking the time to share such a kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful property with a few issues.
Summary: The St. Regis Monarch beach is a beautiful hotel, but my stay had some issues. I checked in Febuary 15th at 1pm. The lady at check in was very nice. She was able to get us early check in and late check out. She offered me an upgrade to a resort view guestroom instead of the garden view. The resort view would not be available at my time of check in so I refused the upgrade. We were escorted to our room 143. My first impressions of the room were positive. It was very spacious and luxurious. However the carpet was a bit aged although clean, and the old Sony CD player alarm clock was an eyesore. The bathroom was probably the best part of the room. Very luxurious and fantastic water pressure. There was one problem. The toilet made a disturbing loud sound after being flushed multiple
Manager Response: Dear hotelsrockk,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort overall, but apologize that the room quality and your dining experience was not above your expectations. We are currently undergoing a room refresh, so the next time you stay with us we hope you enjoy the enhancements to the room, including new carpet and a new blue-tooth alarm clock. In regards to your dining experience, we ask that you please reach out to our Food & Beverage Manager, Shannon Simpson, directly at (949)234-3316 to discuss the issues further. We want you to feel confident that your next visit with us will be nothing short of amazing!

Summary Heading: Used to be my favorite property....but today's service was a disappointment
Summary: I have stayed here many times throughout the years and decided to come here to celebrate my birthday today with friends and family. Unfortunately today's service has been a let-down. There were lines at the check-in and a rude front check-in experience. NOT what I have expected from this property, the St. Regis brand or how anyone wants to be greeted on their birthday. Also, my preferences that were emailed ahead were not saved, which should be the minimum of any 5-star experience.
Manager Response: Dear Eliz0220,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that your stay did not exceed your expectations. We will address the issues regarding your check-in experience with our Front Desk team to ensure that this does not happen again. We wish you a wonderful birthday and hope that you will come to visit us again.

Summary: The St. Regis is a splendid resort to stay at.  My girlfriend and I spent the Valentines Day weekend here.  The staff were all very courteous and went out of their way to make our stay perfect.  We had a king bed room overlooking the golf course, and it was awesome.  It had more than enough room for 2 of us and the beds were very comfortable.  I recommend the golf course view for the tremendous sunsets and the golf course/ocean view.   We had dinner at the Bay Club which is located right on the beach.  That was an amazing experience.  The GM "Dan" was such a gracious host and a pleasure to talk with.  Dan's staff were on top of the service and kudos for him hiring such a great wait staff. I will definitely be going back to the St. Regis and specifically the Bay Club for dinner
Manager Response: Dear Lucas M,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for Valentine's Day! We are so pleased to hear that you and your girlfriend enjoyed your time at our resort. We will be sure to share your kind words with Dan and the entire Monarch Bay Club staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Gorgeous, gracious and so much going for it!
Summary: We just returned from a 4 night stay here over the President's day weekend, which included Valentine's day, temps in the 80s and some unexpected crowds at the hotel.  We took full advantage of all of the magnificent facilities at this property -- the pool, the beach, the health club, the fire pits on the balcony, the pianist in the lounge, and of course the spectacular sunsets over the beautiful grounds of this property.  It's a special place, made more so by the quality of the staff.  Friendly greetings by all, and a real desire to please.  Quality of the food and drink was excellent.  Really glad we stayed here and would come again!
Manager Response: Dear WallyMaple,  Thank you for your recent stay with us for President's Day weekend! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at our resort and enjoyed the many facilities which we offer. We hope to be able to welcome you back again for another memorable sunset!

Summary: We stayed here in August with our two little children and had a marvelous time.  First, the staff's service and attention to detail are unparalleled.  Our room wasn't quite ready when we arrived and while we were waiting, we headed to the beach for a while.  Before we went to the beach, the staff gave pails and little stuffed animals to our girls.  They loved it.  The shuttle to the beach is so convenient and the staff at the beach is helpful.  We dined on the property for lunch, dinner and breakfast and found the restaurant to provide delicious options for the grown-ups and kids alike.  The pool is a saltwater pool and we had so much fun there.  Finally, our butler brought out little girls a rob and slippers, just their size.  Watching them all cozy in their robes and slippers
Manager Response: Dear tshissler,  Thank you for taking the time to share such a kind review of your recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time at our resort and that you have lasting family memories from your stay. We truly look forward to welcoming you and your family back again!

Summary: The St. Regis is just remarkable. Remarkable for its setting, for its rooms, for its majesty and for its service. Too many reviews on TripAdvisor rate perfectly fine -- expectation-beating -- hotels as "five star." And I'm guilty of that myself.  This hotel confirms what it means to actually deliver on that scale.  First of all, the setting is incredible -- above the beach which provides a view and only a moderate walk to the beach club. And since we were there in February, none of the usual June gloom that has impacted our summer stays. Turning away from the beach towards the hotel and you take in such a beautiful building, where the common areas open up to the central pool area and become great venues for eating, enjoying the sunset or having an after dinner cocktail.  The
Manager Response: Dear drosen85,  Thank you for your recent stay and kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you experience our wonderful "winter" weather and truly enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: We have been escaping to the St Regis Monarch Beach from Beverly Hills every 4-6 weeks for the past few years and it never fails to impress.  From the moment we arrive, we are made to feel at-home.  Kimber always has our "regular" room ready and reservations secured, then Matt catches up with our kids as he escorts us to our room, where Bill, the butler, has ensured that everything is set up perfectly - including our croquet set, which the hotel purchased when they noticed that our kids were playing with an well-worn set that we had brought along from home.   The hotel itself is beautiful and comfortably elegant, and thankfully has resisted the trend of the faux-tropical-Tommy-Bahama-Home-Store-motif to which many of the other California coastal hotels have succumbed in recent
Manager Response: Dear FoodiesinBH,  Thank you so much for your continued patronage of our resort and for sharing such kind comments about our staff and your stays with us! We will be sure to pass along your positive remarks to our entire team, including Kimber, Matt, Bill, April, Raj, Paul and Jenny. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Overall fantastic hotel.  Remarkable staff that went above and beyond to make sure our stay was fantastic.  Hotel was in great condition with no sign of wear & tear.  Spa was very enjoyable although the quality of the massage was a 7.  The beach staff was amazing--Paul went above and beyond to make sure we had everything from moving umbrellas to taking that perfect picture.  The front desk manager even sent a bottle of champagne to top off our weekend!  Only downside was the housekeeping.  They missed the room completely one day (having to do it at turn down service) and then re-stocked for 2 people when there were 3 of us in the room.  They were also putting Krups coffee makers in every room but apparently our room didn't make the cut.  Had to go pay for coffee in the morning
Manager Response: Dear Alison R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your girls weekend getaway! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort overall and that you had a memorable time down at the beach. We will be sure to share your kind words with Paul! We will also be sure to share your comments regarding the housekeeping service with our Director of Housekeeping so that they can be addressed immediately. We hope that you are able to visit us again soon!

Summary: We had the most remarkable service with this hotel. Every single person, from the valet to the restaurant, they all wear a smile on their face and when you turn a corner they are there to help you. Because you will get lost, that the only down side is the hotel is built top to bottom and there are elevators that don't really go anywhere.  Aside from that we had an amazing lunch at the restaurant below the lobby. We were greeted by a bright smiled young lady and served by Not one but two servers, Enriquw and Jason I believe were their names.  Although we were here for business mostly we did get a few moments to check out the pool where Gus took quite good care of us. I didn't get the opportunity to visit the beach club by my wife said it was so peaceful and secluded.  There were
Manager Response: Dear ghenrik,  Thank you for your recent stay with us! We are pleased to hear that you and your wife enjoyed the resort and that you were able to take time to relax and enjoy the resort while visiting for business. We will be sure to share your kind remarks with Enrique, Jason and Gus. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed a lovely wine dinner at the Monarch Beach Club, part of the St. Regis.  The food was amazing and the service nothing but outstanding.  Our group of 14 had the pleasure of a beautiful view.  I highly recommend a visit to the Monarch Beach Club every time you visit the St. Regis!!!
Manager Response: Dear Allyson C,  Thank you for taking the time to share such wonderful feedback regarding your experience at the Monarch Bay Club! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your dinner and hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Concern over noise in room was met with immediate room change.  David at front desk went above and beyond in making this mini vacation memorable.  Bill K was friendly, gracious and responsive to our needs.  The resort is beautiful, with ocean views everywhere. Beach set up is fantastic, walkable but also can take tram to. Did not have time to play golf but course looked beautiful with many holes having spectacular ocean views. Staff in general friendly and knowledgeable. Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Dear Penny S,  Thank you for your recent visit! We appreciate you sharing such a kind review of your stay and we're so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time here. We will be sure to share your comments with David, Bill and the rest of our team. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: the beach with the beach club make this a definite beach side luxury resort
Summary: The staff is gracious and want your stay to be memorable and first rate. We visited 6 nights during Christmas week and although there may have been some issues, the on site manager and the butler service rectified any mishaps very effectively. We had a one bedroom suite with an adjoining standard room on the 3rd floor ocean view. The terrace is spacious and overlooks the pool grounds and the ocean is in full view. The walk to the beach is quick as you cut across the golf course on a lovely walking path. There is a tram but we chose the walk. The golf club staff is friendly and even offered us water reserved for the golfers. Once at the beach it is totally worth it. The beach club has huge comfortable chairs set up to relax have a cocktail or food we stayed all day and enjoyed
Manager Response: Dear Lorie M,  Thank you for choosing to spend your Christmas holiday with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time away from home. We hope to welcome you back again for more memorable family moments!

Summary: From the friendly greeting Brian gave us to the way Paul took care of us on the beach to the time Erin took to explain the area and sites to visit when we had a evening cocktail, the helpfulness of the staff is best part of this hotel.  While the beach is a short ride from the hotel, it was uncrowded and well kept up by the staff.   The resort was quiet and everything in the room was just right.  Really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Thepunter7,  Thank you for your recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our resort and that our staff exceeded your expectations. We will be sure to share your kind words with Brian, Paul, Erin and the rest of our team. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: You expect that the St. Regis name will mean five star properties and this one is no exception. The amenities are top notch and presented with understated elegance.  Staff are extremely deferential and gracious.  It will not be inexpensive to stay here, but you will get expansive views, luxurious rooms and a complete range of hospitality services.  In addition, the locale is situated in one of the most beautiful places in America, the Dana Point/Laguna Beach area. This property has a policy of building in room and bell gratuities into your room price so that you are not constantly digging for dollars while on site.  A good notion, but we found that old habits are hard to break....by both customers and staff. Attached to the resort is a championship golf course and the dining
Manager Response: Dear tony c,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share such kind comments regarding our staff and property! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: I pretty much agree with the review from beachbug on Jan 31. This is a large resort and it feels very standard both in terms of decor, service etc. If i had to rank the best hotels in the area, i would say Montage, then Ritz the St. Regis (they are within 5 mns from each other).   This is a large property and does feel a bit like your average hotel especially when it comes to the decor and the food.   Also another small thing is the Westin horrible "signature fragrance" that they have taken to wafting through the lobbies if all their hotels and also designed bathroom amenities to have that same cheap smell. For some reason this St Regis has decided it would be a good idea to waft the same scent, all through their lobby. Luckily the lobby is open on both sides so there is enough
Manager Response: Dear liketotravelNewYork,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding our property. We apologize that your time with us did not exceed your expectations. We strive to offer superior service and decor which match our five-star staff and facilities. We will be sure to share your comments with our Executive Team for addressing and hope that you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, not a great beach and a little stuffy though
Summary: I'll start out by saying the hotel is very beautiful.  It's a golf resort--- so bear that in mind.  It can feel a bit stuffy so if you are looking for a secluded getaway this isn't your place but if you want to treat yourself to a 5-star spa/getaway weekend in a posh setting, this will work perfectly.   The pool is a little small and fills up quickly with children, just something else to note.   The hotel is a small trek on foot or 5ish min golf cart ride to the beach, which they share with a local private beach club.  This was the biggest disappointment for me.  The beach was kind of gross.  Lots of debris and bugs swarming through the seaweed.  Not a pretty picture-esque type of beach, I found venice beach to be nicer and cleaner, which really says a lot.  The drinks were
Manager Response: Dear Avidrulz,  Thank you for taking time to share feedback regarding your stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our room accommodations, however we apologize that your beach experience did not exceed your expectations. Our Monarch Bay Club and adjoining beach are private and exclusive to our resort guests and members. We will be sure to share your comments with our Executive Team for further addressing and hope to be able to welcome you back again!

Summary: Last minute, I decided to take a quick holiday escape in between Christmas and NYE. A quick 45 min drive south of Los Angeles for my husband and 2 year old toddler. All in all, top notch service, room accomodations, and elegant dining options. We had a terrific room overlooking the pool and beach. (That would be my recommendation to ask for rooms on floors 4-5).   A quick walk down to the beach and they have a nice jogging trail for morning exercise or for those who don't want to schlep items down to the beach, they offer a tram service too.   The Michael Mina restaurant was a splurge and we were able to secure a babysitter via the concierge service prior to arriving. A VERY RELAXING HOLIDAY ESCAPE!
Manager Response: Dear calitravlerone,  Thank you for your recent stay and for the wonderful review! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy your quick getaway and that you were able to experience many of the amenities which we offer. We hope to welcome you back again!

Summary: My new "go to" in OC. Worth every penny. Breakfast in bed Christmas morning. Drinks at the private club beachside. Wow. And if you have an Amex Platinum card and reserve with them, dining credits and free breakfast really make the stay special. You don't need to stay across the street at brand RC to get to the beach. Shuttle drops you on demand. Loved it.
Manager Response: Dear Fozmonster,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate Christmas by staying at our resort! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and were able to relax. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort With a Few Caveats
Summary: I am a little bit late writing this review as I stayed over the Labor Day holiday.  Overall the St. Regis is a beautiful resort, and I would probably stay there again, but there are a few things that I would note. The resort has a little bit of a cruise ship feel as it is very large and it hosts many weddings and corporate retreats.  If you prefer intimate resorts, then this is not the place for you. This is also not the place where staff are going to remember your name, but yet it is also not a cheap resort.  So, I am a little conflicted in recommending this one to others and I think it comes down to how much you pay per night. The rooms are great and the beach area is really beautiful.  I did not mind having to take a golf cart down to the beach, since the trade off is that
Manager Response: Dear beachbug,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and will be sure to share your comments regarding check-in and staff with our Executive Management team for further addressing. We sincerely apologize that your stay did not exceed your expectations and hope to welcome you back again to show you our true five-star service which we're known for.

Summary: My family and I absolutely had the greatest experinece we could have ever imagined. The hotel staff was very young but suprisingly polished. The St Regis is in a perfect location for family vacations and the butler program there is stellar!
Manager Response: Dear Iceman93586,  Thank you for your recent stay and for the kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our resort and hope to welcome you back again for another memorable family vacation!

Summary: This was our second time at the St Regis. It was just as wonderful this time. This is a truly gorgeous property. We really love it here. The service is unbeatable. As soon as we got there we walked along the paths down to the beach, wow!  We spent two days hanging by the pool. It is fantastic. Wonderful pool side service. The cobb salad is fantastic. The bloody mary was the best I'd had since the last time I had one there!  The gym is great and there is a lap pool with a hot tub.  I had the short ribs in the dining room, they were incredible!  The St Regis Monarch Beach is  the grandest and most beautiful resort we've ever visited. Top notch all the way.  I hope we are lucky enough to go there again sometime.
Manager Response: Dear 154974Janet,  Thank you for sharing such a wonderful review! We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I was lucky enough to win a sales incentive trip from one of the companies I do business with. This place was phenomenal. The room was first class. Everything from the linens to the toiletries in the bathroom were so luxurious. We only ate one breakfast there because it's very expensive but it was really good and the setting  is very nice. The location is not that great because you're far from the beach but the views are great and the pool area is very nice. However, there's a public bus line a couple of blocks away that takes you to the beach towns like Laguna Beach where there's plenty to do and many restaurants to choose from. We also took the bus to San Juan Capistrano. Overall, we had a great time and we didn't have to rent a car. I would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Dear HappyTraveler1998,  Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing such a kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your trip to our resort and look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: I stayed at this resort for two nights and left feeling a bit let down. The property, the scenery and the setting are outstanding, Perched on a hillside, overlooking the ocean, you constantly see the palm trees and the Pacific as you walk by huge windows. My dining experience was limited to catered, conference-style buffets but everything was very good. I did get a scone at the coffee bar and ended up throwing it away - it was dry and inedible.I was horribly disappointed in the service. My room was not cleaned until 2:15.  When I came back to the room and needed to change, I had to ask the housekeeper to leave (twice) so I could get to my next meeting. I called the first morning for coffee (there is no coffee service in the room - really?), it took 30 minutes to arrive. The next
Manager Response: Dear incognitodiva,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to share feedback regarding your experience. We sincerely apologize that our service levels did not exceed your expectations, as that is not typical of our resort. We will be sure to share your comments with our Executive Management team for further addressing. We are happy to share though that all of our guestrooms now feature in-room coffee and tea included with your resort fee. We hope to welcome you back again!

Summary: I love Southern California and I love it even more because of The St. Regis Monarch Beach.  I try to stay here every time I visit SoCal and every visit of mine has been consistently amazing.  This time I was upgraded to a spacious Executive Suite with ocean view. By 5:30pm, my window looked like a gorgeous painting of the California sunset!!!  We had to move our arrival date a day later and the front desk was so accommodating of our emergency change.  They were even able to check us in early the next day.  Of course, the St. Regis butler was there to greet us right away.  We did not bother him much but the coffee/tea service in the morning was very much appreciated.  The room was spacious and so is the bathroom! The bathroom was so huge it could well have been a second room!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the St. Regis Monarch Beach once again as I have done every year for the past five years and as always, the stay was wonderful. It seems that the hotel has not aged and it is nice to see so many familiar faces among the team of the hotel.The attention to detail by literally all the associates, the excellent condition of the hotel and particular my room plus the location and the facilities of the resort make this hotel a favorite of mine. The food and beverage venues are also excellent and I believe this is by far one of the best (if not the best) options for a great vacation or a relaxing few days off in Southern California. I look forward to returning to the hotel soon again!
Manager Response: Dear Samoht60,  Thank you for your loyal patronage of our resort! We truly appreciate the kind review and look forward to welcoming you back again next year for another wonderful vacation!

Summary: We have traveled to the Dana Point / Newport Beach area annually for the last few years to enjoy the great scenery and wonderful weather.  This year we decided to try the St. Regis instead of the other resorts we previously selected: what a disappointment the St. Regis was.  Does not compare to the other fine resorts in the area.  The facility is very tired looking and worn.  The staff was very courteous and always tried to be helpful however several gaffs in St. Regis' systems and practices overshadowed the staff's attempts.  The St. Regis is not inexpensive which made the "well worn" condition of the resort and the unfortunate experiences we had totally unacceptable.  There are much better choices in the area.  We won't be back.
Manager Response: Dear 368frankm,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that your visit did not exceed expectations. We encourage you to call our Executive Offices directly at (949) 234-3301 to discuss the experience you had so we can rectify the situation.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hospitality at St. Regis Monarch Beach
Summary: As a Minneapolis resident, I was very pleased to be able to attend a conference at the St. Regis Monarch Beach in January and to be able to bring my wife and 2 year old daughter.  Fortunately, the Socal weather was even better than usual during our stay and we were able to enjoy an exquisite day at the pool yesterday.  The property is absolutely stunning with views to the ocean and all landscaping in perfect condition.  Our pool attendant, Matthew, could not have been more genuine and helpful setting us up for our preferred sun exposure and we enjoyed a couple of refreshing cocktails cocktails in the pool.  After swimming, we cleaned up at the amazing spa and headed out to Laguna Beach for dinner.  I want to recognize the amazing service we received from the whole team and a
Manager Response: Dear benfrommn,  Thank you for your recent stay and kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed our warm California winter weather and had a wonderful stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I stay at the hotel once a month for work and the staff is always amazing!  I had an ocean view room and a butler.  I love the 24 hr access to the fitness center and was also was able to play golf on my last trip.  Love this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Bicoastal1981,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us each month; we truly appreciate your loyalty! We look forward to continuing to welcome you to our resort!

Summary Heading: St. Regis Monarch Beach - You really do get what you pay for
Summary: I've attached a few pictures of the room (419) I stayed in on January 14, 2015 while attending a due-diligence meeting at the hotel.  I have also previously stayed at the Ritz Carleton Dana Point as recently as last September for another meeting.  The two hotels are only a quarter mile apart. The St. Regis doesn't have the views of the ocean that the Ritz does, but the accommodations are more updated and luxurious at the St. Regis.  It does have several patios where you can watch the sunset over the ocean, just a half-mile from the hotel.  Free wifi in the rooms and common areas for guests, a spectacular spa is complementary with your stay and several excellent restaurants are available for the most discriminating palate.  You will also find more stores for gifts or personal
Manager Response: Dear Mark P,  Thank you for taking the time to share such kind feedback regarding your recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at the resort and were able to experience many of the amenities which we have to offer. We hope to be able to welcome you back again in the near future!

Summary: My husband and I had a golf and stay package. The course was in great shape and the Marshals kept the pace of play reasonable. The hotel and grounds were very nice. Our room and especially bathroom was large and well appointed. Food in restaurants, room service etc. was good.  My only problem with the hotel was at checkout. We're not rich so I actually read the line items on our bill and there were so many errors and hidden charges.Beware!
Manager Response: Dear preecelJ,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort and amenities while you were staying with us, however we truly apologize that your last interaction included accounting errors. We will be sure to share your feedback with our Accounting department. If you feel that there is anything else we can do, please call our Executive Offices at (949) 234-3301. We hope to be able to welcome you back again!

Summary: Stayed here for our Anniversary weekend and all I can say is wow.  They took such great care of us - we received a free bottle of champagne in our room and also a free snack at the pool without even mentioning it was our anniversary.  The property itself is immaculate and really feels like a resort in the heart of a very busy Orange County.  There are plenty of terrific restaurants within 5 or 10 minutes driving from the hotel.  I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend this hotel to a couple looking for a getaway weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Ken M,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate such a special occasion with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our resort. We hope to be able to welcome you back again for future celebrations!

Summary: I am absolutely befuddled as to how this hotel gets such rave reviews.  I stayed for business in August.  The front desk was disorganized.  The bellmen were all lined up on the side of the lobby as if ready to assist when called upon; however, they ended up being more interested in talking with each other than to assist.  All of our luggage was tagged, yet they couldn't manage to get it to the proper rooms.  Once inside the guest rooms, I felt like I stepped back into the 1990's - they are DATED and tired.  The room size is great and the bathrooms are nice but the property is in dire need of a design update/renovation.  We did not go to the beach - but just the grounds around the hotel had garbage in the shrubs, etc. I have stayed at many St. Regis properties and regrettably
Manager Response: Dear CorpPlanner_11,  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your stay this past August. We sincerely apologize that your stay did not exceed your expectations, as this is not typical of our service and facilities. We will be sure to share your comments regarding your arrival experience and facility cleanliness with our Executive Management team. We hope that we will be able to welcome you back again to showcase our true five-star service and facilities.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 5 days without the kids.  We wanted 5 more days!  We had a king bed suite on A lower floor facing the exterior of the hotel, which was a housing sub-division (very nice).  We were there for a company trip.  Everything was first class.  Our room, bedding, wifi, etc, were exceptional.  Room service was great as well as the service at the lobby bar and restaurants.  The grounds were immaculate, as we had breakfast on the lawn every morning.  After breakfast, we sat at the main lobby balcony to read the paper, plan our day and to take in the views of the ocean and golf course.  Our entertainment at the hotel was Aerosmith!  That's right a concert on property.  We walked to catch the bus to take us to the coast for shopping.  It was an excellent
Manager Response: Dear TJWDFW,  Thank you for your stay and for taking the time to write such a kind review! We are so pleased to hear that you and your wife were able to enjoy a little getaway and experience many of the amenities which we offer. We hope to welcome you both back again!

Summary Heading: Great location for walks by the beach. Beware of room service.
Summary: Hotel was located close to the beach and the stroll was very pleasant.  Staff was overall friendly, rooms were nice, bathroom was by far the nicest part of the rooms.  We stayed on the second floor facing the pool with partial water view. The sunset from the rooms were beautiful as well.  What let the hotel down was the room service. We stayed over New Years and room service was taking close to 1.5 hours each time. We were told because it's their holiday season therefore they are short staffed. This is extremely puzzling because why wouldn't you arrange for more staff to be on during the holiday period that you know you would be busy.  In addition to the long wait, the room service gave us the wrong order. We ordered a club sandwich with cheese so when it came without cheese
Manager Response: Dear Nicky M,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to share feedback regarding your time at our resort. We sincerely apologize that the service you experienced was not reflective of our typical five-star standards. If you feel there is anything further we can do for you to rectify this situation, please call our Executive Offices directly at (949) 234-3301.

Summary: The property is gorgeous and even though the resort is not "beach front" with exceptional views of the ocean, the landscape and resort itself is immaculate and beautiful. I enjoyed my time at the spa getting a massage and relaxing in the aroma sauna. The fitness center is filled with natural light, has a great selection of machines and is also very clean. I tried the strap yoga class (I'm fairly new to yoga) and I now I'm hooked! The Champagne Brunch on Sunday is amazing! There are so many options and it is all delicious. Definitely skip breakfast if taking on the Champagne Brunch buffet!
Manager Response: Dear Smith406,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and for the wonderful review! We are so pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy many of the amenities which we offer, including our popular Strap Yoga class and Sunday Brunch! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!
